notes.zh:
配料：猪肉、青椒、红椒、大蒜、生姜、酱油、盐、料酒、食用油
做法：1. 猪肉切片，用料酒和酱油腌制15分钟。2. 青椒和红椒切丝，蒜姜切末。3. 热锅加油，放入蒜姜爆香。4. 加入猪肉炒至变色，再加入辣椒丝翻炒。5. 加盐调味，炒匀出锅。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Pork, green peppers, red peppers, garlic, ginger, soy sauce, salt, cooking wine, cooking oil
Method: 1. Slice pork and marinate with cooking wine and soy sauce for 15 minutes. 2. Slice green and red peppers, mince garlic and ginger. 3. Heat oil in a pan, sauté garlic and ginger until fragrant. 4. Add pork and stir-fry until it changes color, then add pepper slices and stir-fry. 5. Season with salt, stir well, and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：猪肉、胡萝卜、葱、姜、酱油、盐、食用油
做法：1. 猪肉切片，胡萝卜切丝，葱姜切末。2. 猪肉用酱油腌制10分钟。3. 热锅加油，爆香葱姜。4. 放入猪肉炒至变色，再加入胡萝卜丝翻炒。5. 加盐调味，炒至胡萝卜变软即可。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Pork, carrots, green onions, ginger, soy sauce, salt, cooking oil
Method: 1. Slice pork, shred carrots, mince green onions and ginger. 2. Marinate pork with soy sauce for 10 minutes. 3. Heat oil in a pan, sauté green onions and ginger. 4. Add pork and stir-fry until it changes color, then add carrot shreds and stir-fry. 5. Season with salt and cook until carrots soften.

name.en: Stir-fried Pork Belly with Leek and Tofu

notes.zh:
配料：五花肉、韭菜、香干（干豆腐）、蒜、酱油、盐、食用油
做法：1. 五花肉切片，韭菜切段，香干切条，蒜切末。2. 热锅加油，放入五花肉煸炒出油。3. 加入蒜末爆香，再放入香干翻炒。4. 最后加入韭菜，快速翻炒，加酱油和盐调味，出锅。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Pork belly, leeks, dried tofu, garlic, soy sauce, salt, cooking oil
Method: 1. Slice pork belly, cut leeks into segments, slice dried tofu into strips, mince garlic. 2. Heat oil in a pan, stir-fry pork belly until oil renders. 3. Add minced garlic and sauté until fragrant, then add dried tofu and stir-fry. 4. Finally, add leeks, stir-fry quickly, season with soy sauce and salt, and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：猪里脊肉、葱、甜面酱、酱油、料酒、糖、淀粉、食用油
做法：1. 猪里脊切丝，用料酒、酱油和淀粉腌制20分钟。2. 葱切丝备用。3. 热锅加油，放入肉丝快速炒散至变色，盛出。4. 锅中留底油，加入甜面酱炒香，加糖和少许水调匀。5. 放入肉丝翻炒均匀，搭配葱丝食用。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Pork tenderloin, green onions, sweet bean paste, soy sauce, cooking wine, sugar, cornstarch, cooking oil
Method: 1. Shred pork tenderloin, marinate with cooking wine, soy sauce, and cornstarch for 20 minutes. 2. Shred green onions and set aside. 3. Heat oil in a pan, stir-fry pork shreds quickly until they change color, then remove. 4. Leave some oil in the pan, add sweet bean paste and stir-fry until fragrant, then add sugar and a little water to mix. 5. Return pork to the pan, stir-fry evenly, and serve with green onion shreds.

notes.zh:
配料：猪里脊肉、木耳、胡萝卜、青椒、葱姜蒜、酱油、醋、糖、淀粉、辣椒、食用油
做法：1. 猪肉切丝，用酱油和淀粉腌制。2. 木耳泡发切丝，胡萝卜和青椒切丝，葱姜蒜切末。3. 调鱼香汁：酱油、醋、糖、淀粉加水拌匀。4. 热锅加油，炒肉丝至变色盛出。5. 锅中爆香葱姜蒜和辣椒，放入蔬菜炒匀，再加入肉丝和鱼香汁，炒至收汁。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Pork tenderloin, wood ear mushrooms, carrots, green peppers, green onions, ginger, garlic, soy sauce, vinegar, sugar, cornstarch, chili peppers, cooking oil
Method: 1. Shred pork and marinate with soy sauce and cornstarch. 2. Soak and shred wood ear mushrooms, shred carrots and green peppers, mince green onions, ginger, and garlic. 3. Prepare Yu Xiang sauce: mix soy sauce, vinegar, sugar, cornstarch, and water. 4. Heat oil in a pan, stir-fry pork until it changes color, then remove. 5. Sauté green onions, ginger, garlic, and chili peppers in the pan, add vegetables and stir-fry, then add pork and Yu Xiang sauce, cooking until thickened.

notes.zh:
配料：猪排骨、葱、姜、蒜、酱油、料酒、糖、八角、食用油
做法：1. 排骨洗净焯水去血沫。2. 热锅加油，放入糖炒至焦糖色，加入排骨翻炒上色。3. 加葱姜蒜、八角炒香，再加入酱油和料酒。4. 加水没过排骨，大火烧开后转小火炖40分钟。5. 大火收汁即可。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Pork ribs, green onions, ginger, garlic, soy sauce, cooking wine, sugar, star anise, cooking oil
Method: 1. Rinse ribs and blanch to remove blood foam. 2. Heat oil in a pan, add sugar and cook until caramelized, then add ribs and stir-fry to coat. 3. Add green onions, ginger, garlic, and star anise, sauté until fragrant, then add soy sauce and cooking wine. 4. Add water to cover the ribs, bring to a boil, then simmer for 40 minutes. 5. Reduce sauce over high heat and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：五花肉、葱、姜、蒜、酱油、料酒、糖、八角、食用油
做法：1. 五花肉切块焯水去腥。2. 热锅加油，加糖炒至焦糖色，放入五花肉翻炒上色。3. 加葱姜蒜和八角炒香，再加入酱油和料酒。4. 加水没过肉，大火烧开后小火炖1小时。5. 大火收汁至浓稠即可。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Pork belly, green onions, ginger, garlic, soy sauce, cooking wine, sugar, star anise, cooking oil
Method: 1. Cut pork belly into chunks and blanch to remove odor. 2. Heat oil in a pan, add sugar and cook until caramelized, then add pork belly and stir-fry to coat. 3. Add green onions, ginger, garlic, and star anise, sauté until fragrant, then add soy sauce and cooking wine. 4. Add water to cover the pork, bring to a boil, then simmer for 1 hour. 5. Reduce sauce over high heat until thick and serve.

name.en: Braised Pork with Potato and Corn

notes.zh:
配料：五花肉、土豆、玉米、葱、姜、酱油、料酒、糖、食用油
做法：1. 五花肉切块焯水，土豆切块，玉米切段。2. 热锅加油，加糖炒至焦糖色，放入五花肉翻炒上色。3. 加葱姜炒香，加入酱油和料酒。4. 放入土豆和玉米，加水炖40分钟。5. 大火收汁即可。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Pork belly, potatoes, corn, green onions, ginger, soy sauce, cooking wine, sugar, cooking oil
Method: 1. Cut pork belly into chunks and blanch, dice potatoes, and cut corn into segments. 2. Heat oil in a pan, add sugar and cook until caramelized, then add pork belly and stir-fry to coat. 3. Add green onions and ginger, sauté until fragrant, then add soy sauce and cooking wine. 4. Add potatoes and corn, cover with water, and simmer for 40 minutes. 5. Reduce sauce over high heat and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：猪肉、面粉、淀粉、鸡蛋、五香粉、盐、食用油
做法：1. 猪肉切小块，用盐和五香粉腌制30分钟。2. 面粉、淀粉和鸡蛋调成糊，裹在肉块上。3. 热锅加油，油温六成热时放入肉块炸至金黄酥脆。4. 捞出控油即可食用。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Pork, flour, cornstarch, egg, five-spice powder, salt, cooking oil
Method: 1. Cut pork into small pieces and marinate with salt and five-spice powder for 30 minutes. 2. Mix flour, cornstarch, and egg into a batter, coat pork pieces. 3. Heat oil in a pan to medium-high heat, fry pork until golden and crispy. 4. Drain oil and serve.

name.en: Hong Kong Style Onion Pork Chop

notes.zh:
配料：猪排、洋葱、酱油、糖、料酒、淀粉、食用油
做法：1. 猪排用刀背拍松，加入酱油、料酒和淀粉腌制20分钟。2. 洋葱切丝。3. 热锅加油，煎猪排至两面金黄，盛出。4. 锅中留油，炒洋葱至软，加糖和酱油调味。5. 放入猪排翻炒均匀即可。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Pork chop, onion, soy sauce, sugar, cooking wine, cornstarch, cooking oil
Method: 1. Tenderize pork chop with the back of a knife, marinate with soy sauce, cooking wine, and cornstarch for 20 minutes. 2. Slice onion. 3. Heat oil in a pan, fry pork chop until golden on both sides, then remove. 4. Leave some oil in the pan, stir-fry onion until soft, season with sugar and soy sauce. 5. Return pork chop to the pan, stir-fry evenly, and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：猪里脊肉、青椒、葱、姜、酱油、盐、淀粉、食用油
做法：1. 猪肉切丝，用酱油和淀粉腌制15分钟。2. 青椒切丝，葱姜切末。3. 热锅加油，爆香葱姜。4. 放入肉丝炒至变色，再加入青椒丝翻炒。5. 加盐调味，炒匀出锅。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Pork tenderloin, green peppers, green onions, ginger, soy sauce, salt, cornstarch, cooking oil
Method: 1. Shred pork and marinate with soy sauce and cornstarch for 15 minutes. 2. Shred green peppers, mince green onions and ginger. 3. Heat oil in a pan, sauté green onions and ginger. 4. Add pork shreds and stir-fry until they change color, then add pepper shreds and stir-fry. 5. Season with salt, stir well, and serve.

name.en: Pork with Vermicelli and Cabbage Stew

notes.zh:
配料：猪肉、粉条、白菜、葱、姜、酱油、盐、食用油
做法：1. 猪肉切片，粉条泡软，白菜切段。2. 热锅加油，炒猪肉至变色，加葱姜炒香。3. 加入白菜翻炒至软，放入粉条。4. 加水和酱油，大火烧开后小火炖20分钟。5. 加盐调味即可。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Pork, vermicelli, cabbage, green onions, ginger, soy sauce, salt, cooking oil
Method: 1. Slice pork, soak vermicelli until soft, cut cabbage into segments. 2. Heat oil in a pan, stir-fry pork until it changes color, add green onions and ginger and sauté. 3. Add cabbage and stir-fry until soft, then add vermicelli. 4. Add water and soy sauce, bring to a boil, then simmer for 20 minutes. 5. Season with salt and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：猪里脊肉、番茄、鸡蛋、淀粉、葱、盐、食用油
做法：1. 猪肉切片，用淀粉和鸡蛋液腌制20分钟。2. 番茄切块，葱切段。3. 热锅加油，将肉片滑炒至变色，盛出。4. 锅中留油，炒番茄至出汁，加水煮开。5. 放入肉片，加盐调味，煮2分钟即可。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Pork tenderloin, tomatoes, egg, cornstarch, green onions, salt, cooking oil
Method: 1. Slice pork and marinate with cornstarch and egg for 20 minutes. 2. Dice tomatoes, cut green onions into segments. 3. Heat oil in a pan, stir-fry pork slices until they change color, then remove. 4. Leave some oil in the pan, cook tomatoes until juicy, add water and bring to a boil. 5. Add pork slices, season with salt, and cook for 2 minutes before serving.

notes.zh:
配料：猪里脊肉、面粉、淀粉、鸡蛋、醋、糖、番茄酱、食用油
做法：1. 猪肉切条，用盐腌制10分钟。2. 面粉、淀粉和鸡蛋调成糊，裹在肉条上。3. 热锅加油，炸肉条至金黄酥脆，捞出。4. 锅中留油，加糖、醋和番茄酱炒匀成酱汁。5. 放入肉条翻炒裹上酱汁即可。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Pork tenderloin, flour, cornstarch, egg, vinegar, sugar, ketchup, cooking oil
Method: 1. Cut pork into strips and marinate with salt for 10 minutes. 2. Mix flour, cornstarch, and egg into a batter, coat pork strips. 3. Heat oil in a pan, fry pork strips until golden and crispy, then remove. 4. Leave some oil in the pan, add sugar, vinegar, and ketchup, stir-fry to make a sauce. 5. Add pork strips, stir-fry to coat with sauce, and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：猪排骨、葱、姜、醋、糖、酱油、料酒、淀粉、食用油
做法：1. 排骨焯水备用。2. 热锅加油，将排骨煎至两面金黄。3. 加葱姜炒香，加入酱油、料酒、醋和糖调味。4. 加水炖煮30分钟至排骨软烂。5. 大火收汁，撒上淀粉水勾芡即可。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Pork ribs, green onions, ginger, vinegar, sugar, soy sauce, cooking wine, cornstarch, cooking oil
Method: 1. Blanch ribs and set aside. 2. Heat oil in a pan, fry ribs until golden on both sides. 3. Add green onions and ginger, sauté until fragrant, then add soy sauce, cooking wine, vinegar, and sugar. 4. Add water and simmer for 30 minutes until ribs are tender. 5. Reduce sauce over high heat, thicken with cornstarch slurry, and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：猪排骨、大蒜、酱油、料酒、糖、盐、食用油
做法：1. 排骨焯水洗净，用酱油、料酒和盐腌制1小时。2. 大蒜切末。3. 热锅加油，放入排骨煎至两面金黄。4. 加入蒜末炒香，加糖和少许水焖煮10分钟。5. 大火收汁即可。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Pork ribs, garlic, soy sauce, cooking wine, sugar, salt, cooking oil
Method: 1. Blanch ribs and rinse, marinate with soy sauce, cooking wine, and salt for 1 hour. 2. Mince garlic. 3. Heat oil in a pan, fry ribs until golden on both sides. 4. Add minced garlic and sauté until fragrant, then add sugar and a little water, simmer for 10 minutes. 5. Reduce sauce over high heat and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：猪梅花肉、蜂蜜、酱油、料酒、糖、五香粉、蒜、食用油
做法：1. 猪肉切长条，用酱油、料酒、糖、五香粉和蒜末腌制一夜。2. 烤箱/空气炸锅预热180度，猪肉放在烤架上，刷上蜂蜜。3. 烤30分钟，每10分钟翻面并刷一次蜜汁。4. 烤至表面焦糖色即可。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Pork shoulder, honey, soy sauce, cooking wine, sugar, five-spice powder, garlic, cooking oil
Method: 1. Cut pork into long strips, marinate with soy sauce, cooking wine, sugar, five-spice powder, and minced garlic overnight. 2. Preheat oven/air fryer to 180°C, place pork on a rack, and brush with honey. 3. Bake for 30 minutes, flipping and brushing with honey every 10 minutes. 4. Bake until caramelized and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：草鱼（或鲤鱼）、葱、姜、蒜、酱油、料酒、糖、盐、八角、食用油
做法：1. 鱼去鳞去内脏，洗净两面切花刀，用料酒腌制10分钟。2. 热锅加油，煎鱼至两面金黄。3. 加葱姜蒜炒香，倒入酱油、糖、料酒、八角。4. 加水淹过鱼身，小火焖煮15分钟。5. 加盐调味，大火收汁即可。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Grass carp (or carp), green onions, ginger, garlic, soy sauce, cooking wine, sugar, salt, star anise, cooking oil
Method: 1. Clean and score both sides of the fish, marinate with cooking wine for 10 minutes. 2. Heat oil in a pan, fry the fish until golden on both sides. 3. Add green onions, ginger, and garlic, stir-fry until fragrant, then add soy sauce, sugar, cooking wine, and star anise. 4. Add water to cover the fish and simmer for 15 minutes. 5. Season with salt and reduce the sauce over high heat.

notes.zh:
配料：草鱼片、酸菜、豆芽、姜、蒜、干辣椒、花椒、料酒、盐、鸡蛋清、淀粉、食用油
做法：1. 鱼片加盐、料酒、蛋清、淀粉抓匀腌制。2. 酸菜切丝，豆芽焯水备用。3. 热锅加油炒姜蒜、花椒和干辣椒，加入酸菜炒香。4. 加水煮沸，放入鱼片煮熟。5. 盛出，撒辣椒花椒热油激香。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Fish fillet (grass carp), pickled mustard greens, bean sprouts, ginger, garlic, dried chili, Sichuan peppercorns, cooking wine, salt, egg white, cornstarch, cooking oil
Method: 1. Marinate fish slices with salt, cooking wine, egg white, and cornstarch. 2. Shred pickled mustard greens and blanch bean sprouts. 3. Heat oil in a pan, sauté ginger, garlic, peppercorns, and dried chili, then add mustard greens. 4. Add water, bring to a boil, and cook fish slices. 5. Serve with hot oil poured over dried chili and peppercorn topping.

notes.zh:
配料：草鱼片、干辣椒、花椒、豆瓣酱、姜、蒜、豆芽、白菜、料酒、食用油、盐
做法：1. 鱼片用料酒和盐腌制，蔬菜焯水铺底。2. 热锅加油，爆香姜蒜、豆瓣酱，加入花椒和干辣椒炒香。3. 加水煮沸，放入鱼片煮熟。4. 盛出，另起锅热油炸香干辣椒与花椒淋在鱼上。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Fish fillet (grass carp), dried chili, Sichuan peppercorns, bean paste, ginger, garlic, bean sprouts, Chinese cabbage, cooking wine, cooking oil, salt
Method: 1. Marinate fish with salt and cooking wine, blanch vegetables and place at bottom. 2. Heat oil, sauté ginger, garlic, and bean paste, then add chili and peppercorns. 3. Add water, bring to a boil, cook fish slices. 4. Pour over with hot oil infused with dried chili and peppercorns.

notes.zh:
配料：牡蛎肉、青椒、红椒、葱、姜、酱油、盐、食用油
做法：1. 牡蛎肉洗净沥干，青椒和红椒切丝，葱姜切末。2. 热锅加油，爆香葱姜。3. 放入牡蛎肉翻炒至变色。4. 加入辣椒丝快速炒匀，加酱油和盐调味即可。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Oyster meat, green peppers, red peppers, green onions, ginger, soy sauce, salt, cooking oil
Method: 1. Rinse and drain oyster meat, shred green and red peppers, mince green onions and ginger. 2. Heat oil in a pan, sauté green onions and ginger. 3. Add oyster meat and stir-fry until it changes color. 4. Add pepper shreds, stir-fry quickly, season with soy sauce and salt, and serve.

name.en: Kung Pao Shrimp with Cashew and Celery

notes.zh:
配料：虾仁、芹菜、腰果、干辣椒、花椒、葱、姜、蒜、酱油、醋、糖、盐、淀粉、食用油
做法：1. 虾仁去壳去虾线，用料酒和淀粉腌制10分钟。2. 芹菜切段，腰果烤香备用。3. 热锅加油，爆香葱姜蒜、干辣椒和花椒。4. 放入虾仁翻炒至变色，再加入芹菜翻炒。5. 加入调好的酱油、糖、醋混合汁翻炒均匀，最后撒上腰果出锅。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Shrimp, celery, cashews, dried chili, Sichuan peppercorns, green onion, ginger, garlic, soy sauce, vinegar, sugar, salt, cornstarch, cooking oil
Method: 1. Devein and clean shrimp, marinate with cooking wine and cornstarch for 10 minutes. 2. Cut celery into segments, roast cashews. 3. Heat oil, sauté green onion, ginger, garlic, dried chili, and peppercorns. 4. Stir-fry shrimp until pink, add celery and stir-fry. 5. Add mixed sauce of soy sauce, sugar, and vinegar, stir well, top with cashews and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：大虾、葱、姜、蒜、酱油、料酒、糖、食用油
做法：1. 大虾剪须洗净。2. 热锅加油，放入大虾煎至两面变红。3. 加葱姜蒜炒香，加入酱油、料酒和糖调味。4. 加少许水焖煮5分钟。5. 大火收汁即可。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Large shrimp, green onions, ginger, garlic, soy sauce, cooking wine, sugar, cooking oil
Method: 1. Trim and rinse shrimp. 2. Heat oil in a pan, fry shrimp until both sides turn red. 3. Add green onions, ginger, and garlic, sauté until fragrant, then add soy sauce, cooking wine, and sugar. 4. Add a little water and braise for 5 minutes. 5. Reduce sauce over high heat and serve.

name.en: Stir-fried Squid Rings with Ginger and Garlic

notes.zh:
配料：鱿鱼、姜、蒜、葱、酱油、料酒、盐、食用油
做法：1. 鱿鱼切圈，用料酒腌制10分钟。2. 姜蒜切末，葱切段。3. 热锅加油，爆香姜蒜。4. 放入鱿鱼圈快速翻炒至卷曲。5. 加酱油和盐调味，撒葱段出锅。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Squid, ginger, garlic, green onions, soy sauce, cooking wine, salt, cooking oil
Method: 1. Cut squid into rings, marinate with cooking wine for 10 minutes. 2. Mince ginger and garlic, cut green onions into segments. 3. Heat oil in a pan, sauté ginger and garlic. 4. Add squid rings and stir-fry quickly until they curl. 5. Season with soy sauce and salt, sprinkle with green onions, and serve.

name.en: Steamed Seafood with Garlic and Vermicelli

notes.zh:
配料：粉丝、生蚝/虾/扇贝、大蒜、葱、酱油、食用油
做法：1. 粉丝泡软铺在盘底，生蚝/虾/扇贝洗净放上。2. 大蒜切末，热油炒香，加入酱油调味。3. 将蒜蓉酱淋在海鲜上。4. 水开后蒸8-10分钟。5. 撒葱花出锅。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Vermicelli, oysters/shrimp/scallops, garlic, green onions, soy sauce, cooking oil
Method: 1. Soak vermicelli until soft and place at the bottom of a dish, rinse oysters/shrimp/scallops and arrange on top. 2. Mince garlic, heat oil and sauté until fragrant, add soy sauce to season. 3. Pour garlic sauce over the seafood. 4. Steam for 8-10 minutes after water boils. 5. Sprinkle with green onions and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：鸡翅、可乐、葱、姜、酱油、料酒、盐、食用油
做法：1. 鸡翅洗净两面划刀，用料酒腌制10分钟。2. 热锅加油，煎鸡翅至两面金黄。3. 加葱姜炒香，加入酱油和可乐没过鸡翅。4. 大火烧开后小火炖20分钟。5. 大火收汁即可。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Chicken wings, cola, green onions, ginger, soy sauce, cooking wine, salt, cooking oil
Method: 1. Rinse chicken wings and score both sides, marinate with cooking wine for 10 minutes. 2. Heat oil in a pan, fry wings until golden on both sides. 3. Add green onions and ginger, sauté until fragrant, then add soy sauce and cola to cover the wings. 4. Bring to a boil, then simmer for 20 minutes. 5. Reduce sauce over high heat and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：鸡翅、土豆、青椒、葱、姜、蒜、酱油、料酒、糖、食用油
做法：1. 鸡翅用料酒和酱油腌制20分钟，土豆切块，青椒切段。2. 热锅加油，煎鸡翅至金黄。3. 加葱姜蒜炒香，放入土豆和青椒翻炒。4. 加水、酱油和糖，大火烧开后小火炖30分钟。5. 大火收汁即可。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Chicken wings, potatoes, green peppers, green onions, ginger, garlic, soy sauce, cooking wine, sugar, cooking oil
Method: 1. Marinate chicken wings with cooking wine and soy sauce for 20 minutes, dice potatoes, cut green peppers into segments. 2. Heat oil in a pan, fry wings until golden. 3. Add green onions, ginger, and garlic, sauté until fragrant, then add potatoes and green peppers, stir-fry. 4. Add water, soy sauce, and sugar, bring to a boil, then simmer for 30 minutes. 5. Reduce sauce over high heat and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：鸡腿肉、葱、姜、酱油、料酒、糖、食用油
做法：1. 鸡腿肉切块，用料酒和酱油腌制15分钟。2. 葱切段，姜切片。3. 热锅加油，煎鸡肉至两面金黄。4. 加葱姜炒香，加入酱油和糖调味。5. 加水小火焖煮20分钟，大火收汁即可。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Chicken thigh, green onions, ginger, soy sauce, cooking wine, sugar, cooking oil
Method: 1. Cut chicken thigh into pieces, marinate with cooking wine and soy sauce for 15 minutes. 2. Cut green onions into segments, slice ginger. 3. Heat oil in a pan, fry chicken until golden on both sides. 4. Add green onions and ginger, sauté until fragrant, then add soy sauce and sugar. 5. Add water, simmer for 20 minutes, then reduce sauce over high heat and serve.

name.en: Fermented Bean Curd Fried Chicken Wings

notes.zh:
配料：鸡翅、红腐乳、蒜、酱油、糖、淀粉、食用油
做法：1. 红腐乳捣碎与酱油、糖、蒜泥混合成腌料，鸡翅腌制2小时。2. 表面裹上一层淀粉。3. 热锅加油，油温七成热时下锅炸至金黄酥脆。4. 捞出控油即可食用。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Chicken wings, red fermented bean curd, garlic, soy sauce, sugar, cornstarch, cooking oil
Method: 1. Mash bean curd and mix with soy sauce, sugar, and minced garlic to make marinade. Marinate chicken wings for 2 hours. 2. Coat wings lightly with cornstarch. 3. Heat oil to 70% hot, deep-fry wings until golden and crispy. 4. Drain oil and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：鸡翅或鸡腿、蒜（蒜香）、蜂蜜（蜂蜜）、醋和糖（糖醋）、面粉、淀粉、盐、食用油
做法：1. 鸡肉用盐腌制20分钟。2. 面粉和淀粉调成糊，裹在鸡肉上。3. 热锅加油，炸鸡肉至金黄酥脆。4. 蒜香：炒蒜末淋上；蜂蜜：刷蜂蜜；糖醋：炒醋和糖成酱汁裹上。5. 出锅食用。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Chicken wings or thighs, garlic (garlic flavor), honey (honey flavor), vinegar and sugar (sweet & sour), flour, cornstarch, salt, cooking oil
Method: 1. Marinate chicken with salt for 20 minutes. 2. Mix flour and cornstarch into a batter, coat chicken. 3. Heat oil in a pan, fry chicken until golden and crispy. 4. Garlic: Sauté minced garlic and drizzle over; Honey: Brush with honey; Sweet & Sour: Stir-fry vinegar and sugar into a sauce and coat. 5. Serve.

name.en: Braised Chicken with Potato and Tomato

notes.zh:
配料：鸡腿肉、土豆、番茄、葱、姜、酱油、糖、食用油
做法：1. 鸡腿肉切块，用酱油腌制15分钟，土豆和番茄切块。2. 热锅加油，煎鸡肉至金黄。3. 加葱姜炒香，放入土豆和番茄翻炒。4. 加水和糖，大火烧开后小火炖30分钟。5. 大火收汁即可。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Chicken thigh, potatoes, tomatoes, green onions, ginger, soy sauce, sugar, cooking oil
Method: 1. Cut chicken thigh into pieces, marinate with soy sauce for 15 minutes, dice potatoes and tomatoes. 2. Heat oil in a pan, fry chicken until golden. 3. Add green onions and ginger, sauté until fragrant, then add potatoes and tomatoes, stir-fry. 4. Add water and sugar, bring to a boil, then simmer for 30 minutes. 5. Reduce sauce over high heat and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：鸡肉、青椒、红椒、干辣椒、葱、姜、蒜、酱油、料酒、盐、食用油
做法：1. 鸡肉切块，用料酒和酱油腌制15分钟。2. 青椒和红椒切丝，葱姜蒜切末，干辣椒剪段。3. 热锅加油，爆香葱姜蒜和干辣椒。4. 放入鸡肉炒至变色，再加入青红椒丝翻炒。5. 加盐调味，炒匀出锅。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Chicken, green peppers, red peppers, dried chilies, green onions, ginger, garlic, soy sauce, cooking wine, salt, cooking oil
Method: 1. Cut chicken into pieces and marinate with cooking wine and soy sauce for 15 minutes. 2. Slice green and red peppers, mince green onions, ginger, and garlic, cut dried chilies into segments. 3. Heat oil in a pan, sauté green onions, ginger, garlic, and dried chilies. 4. Add chicken and stir-fry until it changes color, then add pepper slices and stir-fry. 5. Season with salt, stir well, and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：鸡肉、大蒜、柱侯酱、葱、姜、酱油、食用油
做法：1. 鸡肉切块，用酱油腌制15分钟。2. 大蒜拍碎，葱姜切末。3. 热锅加油，炒鸡肉至变色。4. 加葱姜和大蒜炒香，放入柱侯酱翻炒均匀。5. 加少许水焖煮5分钟即可。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Chicken, garlic, Chu Hou sauce, green onions, ginger, soy sauce, cooking oil
Method: 1. Cut chicken into pieces, marinate with soy sauce for 15 minutes. 2. Crush garlic, mince green onions and ginger. 3. Heat oil in a pan, stir-fry chicken until it changes color. 4. Add green onions, ginger, and garlic, sauté until fragrant, then add Chu Hou sauce and stir-fry evenly. 5. Add a little water, simmer for 5 minutes, and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：鸡腿肉、土豆、香菇、青椒、葱、姜、酱油、料酒、糖、食用油
做法：1. 鸡肉切块，用料酒和酱油腌制15分钟。2. 土豆切块，香菇泡发切片，青椒切段。3. 热锅加油，炒鸡肉至变色。4. 加葱姜炒香，放入土豆、香菇和青椒。5. 加水、酱油和糖，小火焖30分钟，大火收汁即可。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Chicken thigh, potatoes, shiitake mushrooms, green peppers, green onions, ginger, soy sauce, cooking wine, sugar, cooking oil
Method: 1. Cut chicken into pieces, marinate with cooking wine and soy sauce for 15 minutes. 2. Dice potatoes, soak and slice shiitake mushrooms, cut green peppers into segments. 3. Heat oil in a pan, stir-fry chicken until it changes color. 4. Add green onions and ginger, sauté until fragrant, then add potatoes, mushrooms, and green peppers. 5. Add water, soy sauce, and sugar, simmer for 30 minutes, then reduce sauce over high heat and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：鸡胸肉、大蒜、酱油、料酒、盐、食用油
做法：1. 鸡胸肉切片，用酱油和料酒腌制20分钟。2. 大蒜切末。3. 热锅加油，煎鸡肉至两面金黄。4. 加蒜末炒香，加盐调味。5. 炒匀出锅即可。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Chicken breast, garlic, soy sauce, cooking wine, salt, cooking oil
Method: 1. Slice chicken breast, marinate with soy sauce and cooking wine for 20 minutes. 2. Mince garlic. 3. Heat oil in a pan, fry chicken until golden on both sides. 4. Add minced garlic and sauté until fragrant, season with salt. 5. Stir well and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：鸡翅、干辣椒、花椒、葱、姜、蒜、洋葱、土豆、豆瓣酱、酱油、料酒、食用油
做法：1. 鸡翅用料酒和酱油腌制15分钟，土豆切片炸至金黄备用。2. 热锅加油，煎鸡翅至表面金黄。3. 加干辣椒、花椒、葱姜蒜爆香，加入洋葱炒软。4. 放入鸡翅、豆瓣酱炒匀，再加入炸好的土豆片。5. 干锅翻炒均匀后装盘即可。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Chicken wings, dried chilies, Sichuan peppercorns, green onion, ginger, garlic, onion, potato, bean paste, soy sauce, cooking wine, cooking oil
Method: 1. Marinate chicken wings with soy sauce and cooking wine for 15 minutes. Fry potato slices until golden. 2. Pan-fry chicken wings until golden. 3. Sauté dried chili, peppercorns, green onion, ginger, garlic, then add onion and stir-fry. 4. Add chicken wings and bean paste, stir well, add potatoes. 5. Stir everything together and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：鸡肉、土豆、洋葱、干辣椒、花椒、豆瓣酱、啤酒、酱油、葱、姜、蒜、食用油
做法：1. 鸡肉切块焯水去血沫，土豆切块，洋葱切片。2. 热锅加油，爆香葱姜蒜、干辣椒、花椒和豆瓣酱。3. 放入鸡肉翻炒上色后加入啤酒、酱油焖煮20分钟。4. 加入土豆继续焖煮15分钟，最后放入洋葱翻炒收汁即可。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Chicken, potato, onion, dried chili, Sichuan peppercorns, broad bean paste, beer, soy sauce, green onion, ginger, garlic, cooking oil
Method: 1. Blanch chicken pieces to remove blood, cut potato into chunks, slice onion. 2. Heat oil, sauté green onion, ginger, garlic, dried chili, peppercorns, and bean paste. 3. Add chicken, stir-fry until colored, then add beer and soy sauce, simmer 20 minutes. 4. Add potatoes and continue simmering 15 minutes. Finally add onion and stir to reduce sauce.

notes.zh:
配料：鸡胸肉、花生米、干辣椒、花椒、葱、姜、蒜、酱油、糖、醋、淀粉、盐、食用油
做法：1. 鸡胸肉切丁，用酱油和淀粉腌制15分钟。2. 干辣椒剪段，葱姜蒜切末，花生炸香。3. 热锅加油，炒香花椒和干辣椒，加入鸡丁炒至变色。4. 加入葱姜蒜、调好的糖醋汁翻炒。5. 最后加入炸花生炒匀即可。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Chicken breast, peanuts, dried chili, Sichuan peppercorns, green onion, ginger, garlic, soy sauce, sugar, vinegar, cornstarch, salt, cooking oil
Method: 1. Dice chicken breast and marinate with soy sauce and cornstarch for 15 minutes. 2. Cut dried chili, mince green onion, ginger, garlic, and roast peanuts. 3. Heat oil, sauté peppercorns and dried chili, add chicken and stir-fry until color changes. 4. Add aromatics and prepared sweet-sour sauce, stir well. 5. Add peanuts, stir-fry evenly, and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：鸡肉、花椒、干辣椒、葱、姜、蒜、酱油、醋、糖、食用油
做法：1. 鸡肉煮熟后撕成丝，过凉水沥干。2. 葱切段，姜蒜切末，干辣椒剪段。3. 热锅加油，炒香花椒和干辣椒，捞出备用。4. 调酱汁：酱油、醋、糖、炒好的花椒辣椒油拌匀。5. 将酱汁倒入鸡丝中拌匀，撒上葱段后食用。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Chicken, Sichuan peppercorns, dried chilies, green onions, ginger, garlic, soy sauce, vinegar, sugar, cooking oil
Method: 1. Cook chicken, shred it, rinse with cold water, and drain. 2. Cut green onions into segments, mince ginger and garlic, cut dried chilies into segments. 3. Heat oil in a pan, sauté Sichuan peppercorns and dried chilies, then remove and set aside. 4. Mix sauce: soy sauce, vinegar, sugar, and the sautéed pepper-chili oil. 5. Pour sauce over chicken shreds, mix well, sprinkle with green onions, and serve.

name.en: Cold Shredded Chicken with Sesame Sauce

notes.zh:
配料：鸡胸肉、芝麻酱、黄瓜、葱、姜、蒜、酱油、醋、糖、食用油
做法：1. 鸡胸肉煮熟撕成丝，黄瓜切丝备用。2. 芝麻酱加酱油、醋、糖和少量温水调匀。3. 葱姜蒜切末备用。4. 将鸡丝、黄瓜、葱姜蒜和酱汁拌匀。5. 静置5分钟入味后即可食用。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Chicken breast, sesame paste, cucumber, green onion, ginger, garlic, soy sauce, vinegar, sugar, cooking oil
Method: 1. Boil chicken breast and shred, slice cucumber into thin strips. 2. Mix sesame paste with soy sauce, vinegar, sugar, and warm water to make sauce. 3. Mince green onion, ginger, and garlic. 4. Combine all ingredients and mix well. 5. Let sit for 5 minutes before serving.

notes.zh:
配料：黄瓜、蒜、酱油、醋、糖、辣椒油、食用油
做法：1. 黄瓜洗净拍碎切块。2. 蒜切末。3. 调酱汁：酱油、醋、糖、辣椒油拌匀。4. 将酱汁倒入黄瓜中拌匀。5. 静置10分钟后食用。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Cucumber, garlic, soy sauce, vinegar, sugar, chili oil, cooking oil
Method: 1. Rinse cucumber, smash and cut into chunks. 2. Mince garlic. 3. Mix sauce: soy sauce, vinegar, sugar, and chili oil. 4. Pour sauce over cucumber and mix well. 5. Let sit for 10 minutes before serving.

notes.zh:
配料：花生米、大蒜、干辣椒、酱油、糖、食用油
做法：1. 花生米洗净沥干。2. 热锅加油，炸花生米至金黄酥脆，捞出控油。3. 锅中留底油，炒香蒜末和干辣椒。4. 放入花生米，加酱油和糖翻炒均匀。5. 出锅放凉后食用。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Peanuts, garlic, dried chilies, soy sauce, sugar, cooking oil
Method: 1. Rinse and drain peanuts. 2. Heat oil in a pan, fry peanuts until golden and crispy, then drain oil. 3. Leave some oil in the pan, sauté minced garlic and dried chilies. 4. Add peanuts, season with soy sauce and sugar, and stir-fry evenly. 5. Remove from heat, let cool, and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：土豆、葱、蒜、酱油、醋、糖、辣椒油、食用油
做法：1. 土豆去皮切丝，焯水后过凉水沥干。2. 葱切段，蒜切末。3. 调酱汁：酱油、醋、糖、辣椒油拌匀。4. 将酱汁倒入土豆丝中拌匀。5. 撒上葱段后食用。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Potatoes, green onions, garlic, soy sauce, vinegar, sugar, chili oil, cooking oil
Method: 1. Peel and shred potatoes, blanch in boiling water, then rinse with cold water and drain. 2. Cut green onions into segments, mince garlic. 3. Mix sauce: soy sauce, vinegar, sugar, and chili oil. 4. Pour sauce over potato shreds and mix well. 5. Sprinkle with green onions and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：豆腐皮、葱、蒜、酱油、醋、糖、辣椒油、食用油
做法：1. 豆腐皮切丝，焯水后过凉水沥干。2. 葱切段，蒜切末。3. 调酱汁：酱油、醋、糖、辣椒油拌匀。4. 将酱汁倒入豆腐皮中拌匀。5. 撒上葱段后食用。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Tofu skin, green onions, garlic, soy sauce, vinegar, sugar, chili oil, cooking oil
Method: 1. Cut tofu skin into strips, blanch in boiling water, then rinse with cold water and drain. 2. Cut green onions into segments, mince garlic. 3. Mix sauce: soy sauce, vinegar, sugar, and chili oil. 4. Pour sauce over tofu skin and mix well. 5. Sprinkle with green onions and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：豆腐、葱、蒜、酱油、醋、糖、辣椒油、食用油
做法：1. 豆腐切小块，焯水后过凉水沥干。2. 葱切段，蒜切末。3. 调酱汁：酱油、醋、糖、辣椒油拌匀。4. 将酱汁倒入豆腐中拌匀。5. 撒上葱段后食用。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Tofu, green onions, garlic, soy sauce, vinegar, sugar, chili oil, cooking oil
Method: 1. Cut tofu into small cubes, blanch in boiling water, then rinse with cold water and drain. 2. Cut green onions into segments, mince garlic. 3. Mix sauce: soy sauce, vinegar, sugar, and chili oil. 4. Pour sauce over tofu and mix well. 5. Sprinkle with green onions and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：皮蛋、豆腐、葱、酱油、醋、糖、食用油
做法：1. 皮蛋去壳切块，豆腐切小块焯水后过凉水沥干。2. 葱切段。3. 调酱汁：酱油、醋、糖拌匀。4. 将皮蛋和豆腐放入盘中，倒入酱汁拌匀。5. 撒上葱段后食用。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Century egg, tofu, green onions, soy sauce, vinegar, sugar, cooking oil
Method: 1. Peel and cut century egg into pieces, cut tofu into small cubes, blanch, rinse with cold water, and drain. 2. Cut green onions into segments. 3. Mix sauce: soy sauce, vinegar, and sugar. 4. Place century egg and tofu in a dish, pour sauce over and mix well. 5. Sprinkle with green onions and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：鸭肉、啤酒、葱、姜、蒜、酱油、八角、干辣椒、食用油
做法：1. 鸭肉切块焯水去腥。2. 热锅加油，炒鸭肉至出油。3. 加葱姜蒜、八角和干辣椒炒香。4. 倒入啤酒和酱油，大火烧开后小火炖40分钟。5. 大火收汁即可。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Duck, beer, green onions, ginger, garlic, soy sauce, star anise, dried chilies, cooking oil
Method: 1. Cut duck into pieces and blanch to remove odor. 2. Heat oil in a pan, stir-fry duck until oil renders. 3. Add green onions, ginger, garlic, star anise, and dried chilies, sauté until fragrant. 4. Pour in beer and soy sauce, bring to a boil, then simmer for 40 minutes. 5. Reduce sauce over high heat and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：鸭子、蜂蜜、酱油、五香粉、料酒、葱、姜
做法：1. 鸭子洗净，用酱油、五香粉和料酒腌制一夜。2. 烤箱预热180度，鸭子刷上蜂蜜。3. 放入烤箱烤1.5小时，每20分钟翻面并刷蜜汁。4. 烤至皮脆肉嫩，切片搭配葱丝食用。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Duck, honey, soy sauce, five-spice powder, cooking wine, green onions, ginger
Method: 1. Clean duck and marinate with soy sauce, five-spice powder, and cooking wine overnight. 2. Preheat oven to 180°C, brush duck with honey. 3. Roast in the oven for 1.5 hours, flipping and brushing with honey every 20 minutes. 4. Roast until skin is crispy and meat is tender, slice and serve with green onion shreds.

notes.zh:
配料：羊肉、葱、姜、酱油、料酒、盐、食用油
做法：1. 羊肉切薄片，用酱油和料酒腌制15分钟。2. 葱切段，姜切丝。3. 热锅加油，爆香姜丝。4. 放入羊肉快速翻炒至变色。5. 加入葱段翻炒均匀，加盐调味后出锅。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Lamb, green onions, ginger, soy sauce, cooking wine, salt, cooking oil
Method: 1. Slice lamb thinly and marinate with soy sauce and cooking wine for 15 minutes. 2. Cut green onions into segments, shred ginger. 3. Heat oil in a pan, sauté ginger. 4. Add lamb and stir-fry quickly until it changes color. 5. Add green onions, stir-fry evenly, season with salt, and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：羊肉、孜然粉、干辣椒、葱、姜、酱油、盐、食用油
做法：1. 羊肉切薄片，用酱油腌制15分钟。2. 葱切段，姜切丝，干辣椒剪段。3. 热锅加油，爆香姜丝和干辣椒。4. 放入羊肉炒至变色，撒入孜然粉翻炒均匀。5. 加盐调味，加入葱段炒匀后出锅。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Lamb, cumin powder, dried chilies, green onions, ginger, soy sauce, salt, cooking oil
Method: 1. Slice lamb thinly and marinate with soy sauce for 15 minutes. 2. Cut green onions into segments, shred ginger, cut dried chilies into segments. 3. Heat oil in a pan, sauté ginger and dried chilies. 4. Add lamb and stir-fry until it changes color, sprinkle with cumin powder and stir-fry evenly. 5. Season with salt, add green onions, stir well, and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：羊肉、胡萝卜、土豆、西红柿、洋葱、迷迭香、红酒、盐、黑胡椒、橄榄油
做法：1. 羊肉切块焯水去腥，胡萝卜、土豆、西红柿和洋葱切块。2. 热锅加橄榄油煎羊肉至微黄。3. 加入洋葱、胡萝卜和土豆翻炒片刻，倒入红酒煮沸。4. 加西红柿、迷迭香、盐和黑胡椒，炖1小时后收汁即可。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Lamb, carrots, potatoes, tomatoes, onions, rosemary, red wine, salt, black pepper, olive oil
Method: 1. Cut lamb into pieces, blanch to remove odor. Dice vegetables. 2. Heat olive oil, sear lamb until lightly browned. 3. Add onion, carrot, and potato, stir-fry briefly, then pour in red wine and boil. 4. Add tomato, rosemary, salt, and pepper, simmer for 1 hour and reduce sauce before serving.

notes.zh:
配料：牛肉、香菜、葱、姜、蒜、酱油、料酒、盐、食用油
做法：1. 牛肉切薄片，用酱油和料酒腌制15分钟。2. 香菜洗净切段，葱姜蒜切末。3. 热锅加油，爆香葱姜蒜。4. 放入牛肉快速翻炒至变色。5. 加入香菜翻炒均匀，加盐调味后出锅。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Beef, cilantro, green onions, ginger, garlic, soy sauce, cooking wine, salt, cooking oil
Method: 1. Slice beef thinly and marinate with soy sauce and cooking wine for 15 minutes. 2. Rinse cilantro and cut into segments, mince green onions, ginger, and garlic. 3. Heat oil in a pan, sauté green onions, ginger, and garlic. 4. Add beef and stir-fry quickly until it changes color. 5. Add cilantro, stir-fry evenly, season with salt, and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：牛肉、青椒、红椒、葱、姜、酱油、淀粉、盐、食用油
做法：1. 牛肉切丝，用酱油和淀粉腌制15分钟。2. 青椒和红椒切丝，葱姜切末。3. 热锅加油，爆香葱姜。4. 放入牛肉丝炒至变色，再加入辣椒丝翻炒。5. 加盐调味，炒匀后出锅。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Beef, green peppers, red peppers, green onions, ginger, soy sauce, cornstarch, salt, cooking oil
Method: 1. Shred beef and marinate with soy sauce and cornstarch for 15 minutes. 2. Shred green and red peppers, mince green onions and ginger. 3. Heat oil in a pan, sauté green onions and ginger. 4. Add beef shreds and stir-fry until they change color, then add pepper shreds and stir-fry. 5. Season with salt, stir well, and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：牛尾或牛腩、番茄、洋葱、胡萝卜、葱、姜、酱油、料酒、糖、盐、食用油
做法：1. 牛尾或牛腩切块，焯水去血沫。2. 番茄切块，洋葱和胡萝卜切丁，葱姜切末。3. 热锅加油，炒香葱姜，放入牛肉煸炒至表面微焦。4. 加入番茄、洋葱和胡萝卜翻炒，加酱油、料酒和糖调味。5. 加水没过食材，大火烧开后小火炖1.5小时，加盐调味后出锅。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Beef tail or brisket, tomatoes, onion, carrots, green onions, ginger, soy sauce, cooking wine, sugar, salt, cooking oil
Method: 1. Cut beef tail or brisket into chunks and blanch to remove blood foam. 2. Dice tomatoes, onion, and carrots, mince green onions and ginger. 3. Heat oil in a pan, sauté green onions and ginger, then add beef and stir-fry until slightly browned. 4. Add tomatoes, onion, and carrots, stir-fry, and season with soy sauce, cooking wine, and sugar. 5. Add water to cover ingredients, bring to a boil, then simmer for 1.5 hours, season with salt, and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：牛腩、土豆、胡萝卜、洋葱、咖喱块、椰奶、盐、食用油
做法：1. 牛腩切块焯水。2. 热锅加油，炒洋葱至透明，加入牛腩炒至表面焦黄。3. 加土豆和胡萝卜块翻炒。4. 加入咖喱块和椰奶，加水炖40分钟。5. 加盐调味，大火收汁即可。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Beef brisket, potatoes, carrots, onions, curry blocks, coconut milk, salt, cooking oil
Method: 1. Cut beef brisket into chunks and blanch. 2. Heat oil in a pan, sauté onions until translucent, add brisket and brown the surface. 3. Add potato and carrot chunks, stir-fry. 4. Add curry blocks and coconut milk, add water and simmer for 40 minutes. 5. Season with salt, reduce sauce over high heat, and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：牛腱肉、葱、姜、八角、桂皮、酱油、料酒、糖、盐
做法：1. 牛肉焯水去血沫。2. 锅中加水，放入葱姜、八角、桂皮、酱油、料酒和糖煮开。3. 放入牛肉，小火炖2小时。4. 加盐调味，继续炖30分钟。5. 捞出放凉切片即可。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Beef shank, green onions, ginger, star anise, cinnamon, soy sauce, cooking wine, sugar, salt
Method: 1. Blanch beef to remove blood foam. 2. Add water to a pot with green onions, ginger, star anise, cinnamon, soy sauce, cooking wine, and sugar, bring to a boil. 3. Add beef and simmer for 2 hours. 4. Season with salt and simmer for another 30 minutes. 5. Remove, cool, and slice to serve.

notes.zh:
配料：卤牛肉、香菜、葱、花椒油、酱油、醋、糖、辣椒油
做法：1. 卤牛肉切薄片，香菜和葱切段。2. 调酱汁：酱油、醋、糖、花椒油和辣椒油拌匀。3. 将酱汁倒入牛肉中拌匀。4. 撒上香菜和葱段即可。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Braised beef, cilantro, green onions, Sichuan pepper oil, soy sauce, vinegar, sugar, chili oil
Method: 1. Slice braised beef thinly, cut cilantro and green onions into segments. 2. Mix sauce: soy sauce, vinegar, sugar, Sichuan pepper oil, and chili oil. 3. Pour sauce over beef and mix well. 4. Sprinkle with cilantro and green onions and serve.

name.en: Stir-fried Braised Beef with Garlic Sprouts

notes.zh:
配料：卤牛肉、蒜苗、葱、姜、酱油、食用油
做法：1. 卤牛肉切片，蒜苗切段，葱姜切末。2. 热锅加油，爆香葱姜。3. 放入牛肉翻炒，再加入蒜苗快速炒匀。4. 加酱油调味，出锅即可。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Braised beef, garlic sprouts, green onions, ginger, soy sauce, cooking oil
Method: 1. Slice braised beef, cut garlic sprouts into segments, mince green onions and ginger. 2. Heat oil in a pan, sauté green onions and ginger. 3. Add beef and stir-fry, then add garlic sprouts and stir-fry quickly. 4. Season with soy sauce and serve.

notes.zh: 1.5酱油 2蜂蜜😋
notes.en: 1.5 soy sauce, 2 honey

notes.zh:
配料：牛肉、豆芽、干辣椒、花椒、葱、姜、蒜、豆瓣酱、酱油、食用油
做法：1. 牛肉切薄片，用淀粉和酱油腌制15分钟。2. 热锅加油，炒香豆瓣酱、干辣椒和花椒。3. 加水煮开，下豆芽煮熟捞出垫底。4. 下牛肉煮至变色，淋上热油和葱花即可。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Beef, bean sprouts, dried chilies, Sichuan peppercorns, green onions, ginger, garlic, bean paste, soy sauce, cooking oil
Method: 1. Slice beef thinly, marinate with cornstarch and soy sauce for 15 minutes. 2. Heat oil in a pan, sauté bean paste, dried chilies, and peppercorns. 3. Add water and bring to a boil, cook bean sprouts and remove to serve as a base. 4. Add beef and cook until it changes color, drizzle with hot oil and green onions, and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：牛肉、土豆、葱、姜、酱油、盐、食用油
做法：1. 牛肉切片，用酱油腌制15分钟，土豆切片。2. 热锅加油，炒牛肉至变色，盛出。3. 加葱姜炒香，放入土豆片炒至半熟。4. 回锅牛肉，加盐调味，炒匀即可。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Beef, potatoes, green onions, ginger, soy sauce, salt, cooking oil
Method: 1. Slice beef and marinate with soy sauce for 15 minutes, slice potatoes. 2. Heat oil in a pan, stir-fry beef until it changes color, then remove. 3. Sauté green onions and ginger, add potato slices and cook until half-done. 4. Return beef to the pan, season with salt, stir well, and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：牛肉、青椒、葱、姜、酱油、淀粉、食用油
做法：1. 牛肉切丝，用酱油和淀粉腌制15分钟。2. 青椒切丝，葱姜切末。3. 热锅加油，爆香葱姜。4. 放入牛肉丝炒至变色，再加青椒丝翻炒。5. 加盐调味，出锅即可。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Beef, green peppers, green onions, ginger, soy sauce, cornstarch, cooking oil
Method: 1. Shred beef and marinate with soy sauce and cornstarch for 15 minutes. 2. Shred green peppers, mince green onions and ginger. 3. Heat oil in a pan, sauté green onions and ginger. 4. Add beef shreds and stir-fry until they change color, then add pepper shreds and stir-fry. 5. Season with salt and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：牛肉、黑胡椒粉、洋葱、青椒、酱油、糖、淀粉、食用油
做法：1. 牛肉切丁，用酱油和淀粉腌制20分钟。2. 洋葱和青椒切块。3. 热锅加油，炒牛肉至变色，盛出。4. 加洋葱和青椒炒软，放入牛肉。5. 加黑胡椒粉和糖调味，炒匀即可。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Beef, black pepper powder, onion, green pepper, soy sauce, sugar, cornstarch, cooking oil
Method: 1. Dice beef and marinate with soy sauce and cornstarch for 20 minutes. 2. Dice onion and green pepper. 3. Heat oil in a pan, stir-fry beef until it changes color, then remove. 4. Sauté onion and green pepper until soft, add beef back. 5. Season with black pepper and sugar, stir well, and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：鸡蛋、青椒、盐、食用油
做法：1. 青椒去籽切丝，鸡蛋打散加少许盐。2. 热锅加油，倒入蛋液炒至微凝固。3. 加入青椒丝翻炒至断生，炒匀出锅。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Eggs, green peppers, salt, cooking oil
Method: 1. Remove seeds and slice green peppers. Beat eggs with a pinch of salt. 2. Heat oil, pour in eggs and cook until semi-set. 3. Add green peppers and stir-fry until tender. Mix well and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：鸡蛋、韭菜、盐、食用油
做法：1. 韭菜洗净切段，鸡蛋打散加盐。2. 热锅加油，炒鸡蛋至凝固盛出。3. 加入韭菜炒软，再倒入鸡蛋炒匀即可。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Eggs, Chinese chives, salt, cooking oil
Method: 1. Wash and cut chives. Beat eggs with salt. 2. Stir-fry eggs until set and remove. 3. Stir-fry chives until soft, then return eggs and mix well.

notes.zh:
配料：鸡蛋、芦笋、盐、食用油
做法：1. 芦笋切段焯水，鸡蛋打散加盐。2. 热锅加油，炒鸡蛋至微熟盛出。3. 加入芦笋翻炒，再倒入鸡蛋炒匀即可。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Eggs, asparagus, salt, cooking oil
Method: 1. Cut asparagus into sections and blanch. Beat eggs with salt. 2. Stir-fry eggs until half-cooked and remove. 3. Stir-fry asparagus, then return eggs and mix well.

notes.zh:
配料：鸡蛋、生菜、盐、葱、食用油
做法：1. 生菜洗净切细丝，鸡蛋加盐打匀。2. 热锅加油炒鸡蛋至凝固盛出。3. 再热锅加少许油，爆香葱末，加入生菜炒软。4. 倒入鸡蛋炒匀出锅。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Eggs, lettuce, salt, green onions, cooking oil
Method: 1. Shred lettuce finely, beat eggs with salt. 2. Fry eggs until just set, remove. 3. Heat oil again, sauté green onions, stir-fry lettuce until soft. 4. Return eggs, mix and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：鸡蛋、四季豆、盐、蒜、食用油
做法：1. 四季豆去筋切段，焯水备用。2. 鸡蛋加盐打散。3. 炒蛋至凝固取出。4. 炒四季豆加蒜，最后倒入鸡蛋炒匀。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Eggs, green beans, salt, garlic, oil
Method: 1. Trim and blanch green beans. 2. Beat eggs with salt. 3. Fry eggs until set, remove. 4. Sauté beans with garlic, return eggs, stir and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：菜心、蒜、油渣（可选）、盐、食用油
做法：1. 菜心洗净。2. 白灼做法：加盐焯水1分钟后淋蒜油。3. 炒制做法：热锅爆香蒜末和油渣，快速翻炒菜心，加盐调味出锅。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Choy sum, garlic, pork cracklings (optional), salt, oil
Method: 1. Wash greens. 2. Blanched version: blanch with salted water 1 min, drizzle garlic oil. 3. Stir-fried version: sauté garlic and cracklings, stir-fry greens, season and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：甘蓝、培根、蒜、盐、食用油、蜂蜜、黑胡椒
做法：1. 甘蓝洗净切段，放入沸水焯1-2分钟后捞出沥干。2. 将焯好的甘蓝放入空气炸锅，200度烤10分钟。3. 培根切小片，蒜切末。4. 热锅加油，放入培根炒出油脂。5. 加蒜末炒香，再放入烤好的甘蓝翻炒至软。6. 加盐、蜂蜜和黑胡椒调味，炒匀后出锅。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Kale, bacon, garlic, salt, cooking oil, honey, black pepper
Method: 1. Rinse and cut kale into segments, blanch in boiling water for 1-2 minutes, then drain. 2. Place blanched kale in an air fryer, bake at 200°C for 10 minutes. 3. Slice bacon into small pieces, mince garlic. 4. Heat oil in a pan, fry bacon until oil renders. 5. Add minced garlic and sauté until fragrant, then add air-fried kale and stir-fry until soft. 6. Season with salt, honey, and black pepper, stir well, and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：土豆、茄子、青椒、大蒜、盐、生抽、蚝油、糖、食用油
做法：1. 土豆、茄子切块，青椒切段。2. 土豆炸至金黄，茄子炸软。3. 热锅加油炒蒜，依次下土豆、茄子、青椒。4. 加调味料炒匀出锅。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Potato, eggplant, green pepper, garlic, salt, soy sauce, oyster sauce, sugar, cooking oil
Method: 1. Cut vegetables into chunks. 2. Fry potato till golden, eggplant till soft. 3. Sauté garlic, stir-fry all vegetables. 4. Add sauces, mix and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：藕、醋、干辣椒、蒜、盐、糖、食用油
做法：1. 藕去皮切片，泡水防氧化。2. 干辣椒、蒜切末。3. 热锅加油，炒香辣椒蒜末。4. 加藕片大火快炒，加糖和醋炒匀。5. 出锅前加盐调味。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Lotus root, vinegar, dried chili, garlic, salt, sugar, oil
Method: 1. Peel and slice lotus root, soak in water. 2. Chop chili and garlic. 3. Stir-fry chili and garlic. 4. Add lotus root, stir with sugar and vinegar. 5. Season with salt and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：莲藕、猪肉末、面粉、淀粉、鸡蛋、葱、姜、酱油、盐、食用油
做法：1. 莲藕切片，猪肉末加葱姜末、酱油和盐拌匀。2. 将肉馅夹在两片莲藕间。3. 面粉、淀粉和鸡蛋调成糊，裹在藕盒上。4. 热锅加油，炸至金黄酥脆。5. 捞出控油后食用。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Lotus root, ground pork, flour, cornstarch, egg, green onions, ginger, soy sauce, salt, cooking oil
Method: 1. Slice lotus root, mix ground pork with minced green onions, ginger, soy sauce, and salt. 2. Sandwich pork filling between two lotus root slices. 3. Mix flour, cornstarch, and egg into a batter, coat the lotus root sandwiches. 4. Heat oil in a pan, fry until golden and crispy. 5. Drain oil and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：包菜、醋、干辣椒、葱、姜、酱油、糖、食用油
做法：1. 包菜撕成片洗净。2. 热锅加油，炒香干辣椒、葱和姜。3. 放入包菜翻炒至软。4. 加醋、酱油和糖调味，快速炒匀即可。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Cabbage, vinegar, dried chilies, green onions, ginger, soy sauce, sugar, cooking oil
Method: 1. Tear cabbage into pieces and rinse. 2. Heat oil in a pan, sauté dried chilies, green onions, and ginger. 3. Add cabbage and stir-fry until soft. 4. Season with vinegar, soy sauce, and sugar, stir-fry quickly, and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：白菜、蒜、干辣椒、酱油、盐、食用油
做法：1. 白菜洗净切段。2. 蒜切片，干辣椒剪段。3. 热锅加油，爆香蒜片和干辣椒。4. 放入白菜翻炒至软。5. 加酱油和盐调味，炒匀后出锅。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Cabbage, garlic, dried chilies, soy sauce, salt, cooking oil
Method: 1. Rinse and cut cabbage into segments. 2. Slice garlic, cut dried chilies into segments. 3. Heat oil in a pan, sauté garlic and dried chilies. 4. Add cabbage and stir-fry until soft. 5. Season with soy sauce and salt, stir well, and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：白菜、猪肉片、粉条、葱、姜、酱油、盐、食用油
做法：1. 白菜切段，粉条泡软，猪肉切薄片。2. 热锅加油，炒猪肉至变色，加葱姜炒香。3. 放入白菜翻炒至软，加入粉条。4. 加水煮开，小火炖至白菜烂糊。5. 加酱油和盐调味后出锅。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Cabbage, pork slices, vermicelli, green onions, ginger, soy sauce, salt, cooking oil
Method: 1. Cut cabbage into segments, soak vermicelli until soft, slice pork thinly. 2. Heat oil in a pan, stir-fry pork until it changes color, add green onions and ginger and sauté. 3. Add cabbage and stir-fry until soft, then add vermicelli. 4. Add water and bring to a boil, simmer until cabbage is mushy. 5. Season with soy sauce and salt, then serve.

notes.zh:
配料：娃娃菜、大蒜、酱油、盐、食用油
做法：1. 娃娃菜洗净切段，大蒜切末。2. 热锅加油，放入蒜末炒香。3. 加入娃娃菜翻炒至软。4. 加酱油和盐调味，炒匀后出锅。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Baby cabbage, garlic, soy sauce, salt, cooking oil
Method: 1. Rinse and cut baby cabbage into segments, mince garlic. 2. Heat oil in a pan, sauté minced garlic until fragrant. 3. Add baby cabbage and stir-fry until soft. 4. Season with soy sauce and salt, stir well, and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：土豆、醋、干辣椒、葱、盐、食用油
做法：1. 土豆去皮切丝，泡水洗去淀粉后沥干。2. 葱切段，干辣椒剪段。3. 热锅加油，爆香干辣椒和葱段。4. 放入土豆丝快速翻炒至变软。5. 加醋和盐调味，炒匀后出锅。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Potatoes, vinegar, dried chilies, green onions, salt, cooking oil
Method: 1. Peel and shred potatoes, soak in water to remove starch, then drain. 2. Cut green onions into segments, cut dried chilies into segments. 3. Heat oil in a pan, sauté dried chilies and green onions. 4. Add potato shreds and stir-fry quickly until soft. 5. Season with vinegar and salt, stir well, and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：土豆、孜然粉、干辣椒、葱、盐、食用油
做法：1. 土豆去皮切小块，煮至八成熟后捞出。2. 葱切段，干辣椒剪段。3. 热锅加油，放入土豆块煎至表面金黄。4. 加干辣椒和葱段炒香，撒孜然粉炒匀即可。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Potatoes, cumin powder, dried chilies, green onions, salt, cooking oil
Method: 1. Peel and cut potatoes into small chunks, boil until 80% cooked, then drain. 2. Cut green onions into segments, cut dried chilies into segments. 3. Heat oil in a pan, fry potato chunks until golden on the surface. 4. Add dried chilies and green onions, sauté until fragrant, then sprinkle with cumin powder and stir-fry evenly. 5. Season with salt, stir well, and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：土豆、培根、葱、蒜、酱油、盐、食用油
做法：1. 土豆去皮切薄片，泡水洗去淀粉后沥干。2. 培根切小片，葱切段，蒜切末。3. 热锅加油，放入培根炒出油脂。4. 加蒜末炒香，再放入土豆片翻炒至熟。5. 加酱油和盐调味，撒上葱段后出锅。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Potatoes, bacon, green onions, garlic, soy sauce, salt, cooking oil
Method: 1. Peel and slice potatoes thinly, soak in water to remove starch, then drain. 2. Cut bacon into small pieces, cut green onions into segments, mince garlic. 3. Heat oil in a pan, fry bacon until oil renders. 4. Add minced garlic and sauté until fragrant, then add potato slices and stir-fry until cooked. 5. Season with soy sauce and salt, sprinkle with green onions, and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：老豆腐、葱、姜、酱油、糖、盐、水淀粉、食用油
做法：1. 豆腐切块煎至两面金黄。2. 加入葱段姜片炒香。3. 倒入酱油、糖，加水煮几分钟。4. 勾芡加盐收汁出锅。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Firm tofu, scallion, ginger, soy sauce, sugar, salt, starch water, oil
Method: 1. Pan-fry tofu till golden. 2. Add scallion and ginger. 3. Pour in soy sauce, sugar, water, simmer. 4. Thicken with starch, season and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：豆腐、牛肉末、豆瓣酱、花椒、干辣椒、葱、姜、蒜、酱油、淀粉、食用油
做法：1. 豆腐切块焯水备用。2. 热锅加油，炒香豆瓣酱、花椒和干辣椒。3. 加葱姜蒜炒香，放入牛肉末炒至变色。4. 加入豆腐，加水煮开后小火炖5分钟。5. 用淀粉水勾芡，撒葱花后出锅。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Tofu, ground beef, bean paste, Sichuan peppercorns, dried chilies, green onions, ginger, garlic, soy sauce, cornstarch, cooking oil
Method: 1. Cut tofu into cubes and blanch in boiling water, set aside. 2. Heat oil in a pan, sauté bean paste, Sichuan peppercorns, and dried chilies. 3. Add green onions, ginger, and garlic, sauté until fragrant, then add ground beef and stir-fry until it changes color. 4. Add tofu, pour in water, bring to a boil, then simmer for 5 minutes. 5. Thicken with cornstarch slurry, sprinkle with green onions, and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：茄子、猪肉末、面粉、淀粉、鸡蛋、葱、姜、酱油、盐、食用油
做法：1. 茄子切片，猪肉末加葱姜末、酱油和盐拌匀。2. 将肉馅夹在两片茄子间。3. 面粉、淀粉和鸡蛋调成糊，裹在茄盒上。4. 热锅加油，炸至金黄酥脆。5. 捞出控油后食用。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Eggplant, ground pork, flour, cornstarch, egg, green onions, ginger, soy sauce, salt, cooking oil
Method: 1. Slice eggplant, mix ground pork with minced green onions, ginger, soy sauce, and salt. 2. Sandwich pork filling between two eggplant slices. 3. Mix flour, cornstarch, and egg into a batter, coat the eggplant sandwiches. 4. Heat oil in a pan, fry until golden and crispy. 5. Drain oil and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：豆皮、土豆片、金针菇、木耳、莴笋等可选配料，辣椒油、花椒油、蒜泥、酱油、醋、香菜
做法：1. 所有食材焯水捞出沥干。2. 加调料拌匀即可食用。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Tofu skin, potato slices, enoki mushrooms, wood ear, lettuce, chili oil, pepper oil, minced garlic, soy sauce, vinegar, cilantro
Method: 1. Blanch all ingredients, drain. 2. Mix with all sauces and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：五花肉片、土豆片、藕片、豆皮、西兰花、香肠、辣椒、花椒、郫县豆瓣酱、蒜、葱、姜
做法：1. 所有食材处理备用。2. 热锅炒香辣椒、花椒、豆瓣酱、蒜姜葱。3. 依次加入主料翻炒入味，出锅装盘。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Pork belly, potato, lotus root, tofu skin, broccoli, sausage, chili, Sichuan peppercorns, douban paste, garlic, scallion, ginger
Method: 1. Prep all ingredients. 2. Sauté chili, peppercorns, paste, garlic, scallion, ginger. 3. Add main ingredients, stir-fry and serve.

notes.zh: 做法：1. 鸡肉切块，用盐和黑胡椒腌制。2. 热锅加橄榄油，煎鸡肉至两面金黄，取出备用。3. 锅中加蒜末炒香，放入番茄炒软。4. 倒入奶油，加入鸡肉煮至软化。5. 放回鸡肉，小火炖5分钟，撒上帕尔马干酪后出锅。
notes.en: Method: 1. Cut chicken into pieces, marinate with salt and black pepper. 2. Heat olive oil in a pan, sear chicken 2-3 minutes per side until golden, then set aside. 3. Sauté minced garlic in the pan until fragrant, add tomatoes and cook until soft. 4. Pour in cream, add chicken, and cook until tender. 5. Return chicken to the pan, simmer for 5 minutes, sprinkle with Parmesan, and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：鸡胸肉、鸡蛋、淀粉、薄荷叶、蒜、泰式甜辣酱、盐、食用油
做法：1. 鸡胸肉拍平，撒盐腌10分钟。2. 裹蛋液和淀粉，煎至两面金黄。3. 切片后淋上蒜末和甜辣酱，撒薄荷叶即可。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Chicken breast, egg, starch, mint leaves, garlic, Thai sweet chili sauce, salt, cooking oil
Method: 1. Flatten chicken breast and marinate with salt. 2. Coat with egg and starch, pan-fry until golden. 3. Slice, drizzle with minced garlic, chili sauce, and mint leaves.

notes.zh: 做法：1. 鸡排两面均匀撒上盐和黑胡椒。2. 在鸡排两面均匀撒上帕玛森芝士。3. 放入预热180度的烤箱烤10分钟。4. 烤好后取出，切成小块即可。
notes.en: Method: 1. Sprinkle chicken cutlets with salt and black pepper evenly. 2. Sprinkle parmesan cheese evenly on both sides of the chicken cutlets. 3. Bake in a preheated 180°C oven for 10 minutes. 4. Bake until golden brown and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：牛肉饼、汉堡胚、生菜、番茄、洋葱、芝士片、沙拉酱
做法：1. 牛肉饼煎至熟透。2. 汉堡胚切开加热。3. 依次夹入生菜、番茄片、洋葱圈、牛肉饼、芝士和酱料组合即可。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Beef patty, burger bun, lettuce, tomato, onion, cheese slice, mayonnaise
Method: 1. Cook beef patty thoroughly. 2. Warm burger bun. 3. Layer lettuce, tomato, onion, patty, cheese, and sauce inside bun and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：薯条、培根、芝士碎、葱花
做法：1. 薯条炸至金黄，培根煎熟切碎。2. 撒上芝士和培根碎，放入烤箱烤至芝士融化。3. 撒葱花后食用。
notes.en:
Ingredients: French fries, bacon, shredded cheese, green onions
Method: 1. Fry fries until golden, cook and chop bacon. 2. Sprinkle cheese and bacon over fries, bake until cheese melts. 3. Top with green onions and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：面粉、酵母、番茄酱、奶酪、火腿、洋葱、青椒、橄榄油
做法：1. 面粉加酵母和水揉成面团，发酵1小时。2. 擀成圆形饼底，涂上番茄酱。3. 撒上奶酪，铺上火腿、洋葱和青椒。4. 放入预热200度的烤箱，烤15-20分钟。5. 烤至奶酪融化后取出食用。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Flour, yeast, tomato sauce, cheese, ham, onion, green pepper, olive oil
Method: 1. Mix flour with yeast and water to form a dough, let ferment for 1 hour. 2. Roll into a round base, spread with tomato sauce. 3. Sprinkle with cheese, top with ham, onion, and green pepper. 4. Bake in a preheated 200°C oven for 15-20 minutes. 5. Remove when cheese is melted and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：土豆、淀粉、盐、食用油
做法：1. 土豆刨丝加盐和淀粉拌匀。2. 捏成小饼状。3. 热锅加油，小火煎至两面金黄酥脆。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Potatoes, cornstarch, salt, cooking oil
Method: 1. Grate potatoes and mix with salt and cornstarch. 2. Shape into small patties. 3. Pan-fry on low heat until crispy and golden on both sides.

notes.zh:
配料：三文鱼、奶油、蒜、洋葱、番茄、菠菜、帕玛森芝士、盐、黑胡椒、橄榄油
做法：1. 三文鱼撒盐和黑胡椒煎至两面微焦。2. 热锅加橄榄油炒蒜末和洋葱，加入奶油、番茄和菠菜煮软。3. 加芝士融化后放入三文鱼，小火炖2分钟即可。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Salmon, butter, garlic, onion, tomato, spinach, parmesan cheese, salt, black pepper, olive oil
Method: 1. Season salmon with salt and pepper, sear until golden. 2. In another pan, sauté garlic and onion, then add butter, tomato, and spinach. 3. Stir in cheese until melted, return salmon to pan, simmer for 2 minutes.

notes.zh: 做法：1. 鸡蛋打散，加入盐和黑胡椒调味。2. 热锅加橄榄油，倒入鸡蛋液，煎至两面金黄。3. 加入番茄酱、洋葱、辣椒粉、橄榄油、盐、黑胡椒调味。4. 放入烤箱/空气炸锅180度烤10分钟。5. 烤好后取出，撒上葱花即可。
notes.en: Method: 1. Beat eggs, season with salt and black pepper. 2. Heat olive oil in a pan, pour in egg mixture, cook until golden on both sides. 3. Add tomato sauce, onion, chili powder, olive oil, salt, black pepper, and cook until soft. 4. Bake in a preheated 180°C oven/air fryer for 10 minutes. 5. Bake until golden brown and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：米饭、鸡蛋、胡萝卜、菠菜、黄豆芽、牛肉、韩式辣酱、香油、芝麻
做法：1. 各种蔬菜分别焯水后调味炒熟。2. 牛肉切丝炒香，鸡蛋煎荷包蛋。3. 米饭中间放蛋，其它配料围边，淋辣酱和香油撒芝麻即可。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Rice, egg, carrot, spinach, soybean sprouts, beef, Korean chili paste, sesame oil, sesame seeds
Method: 1. Blanch and season each vegetable separately. 2. Stir-fry beef strips, fry an egg. 3. Place rice in bowl, top with egg and ingredients, add chili paste, sesame oil, and sesame seeds.

notes.zh:
配料：土豆、黄油、大蒜、奶酪、盐、黑胡椒、欧芹
做法：1. 土豆煮熟后压成泥。2. 加入炒香的蒜末和黄油拌匀，加入奶酪、盐、黑胡椒调味。3. 烤箱烘烤5-8分钟至表面金黄，撒欧芹装饰。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Potato, butter, garlic, cheese, salt, black pepper, parsley
Method: 1. Boil and mash potatoes. 2. Mix in sautéed garlic and butter, then add cheese, salt, and pepper. 3. Bake for 5-8 minutes until golden, garnish with parsley.

name.en: Potato, Bacon and Cheese Egg Pancake

notes.zh:
配料：土豆、培根、鸡蛋、奶酪、盐、胡椒、面粉
做法：1. 土豆刨丝，培根切丁炒香。2. 混合鸡蛋、土豆丝、培根、奶酪和面粉调成糊状。3. 平底锅小火煎至两面金黄。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Potato, bacon, egg, cheese, salt, pepper, flour
Method: 1. Grate potatoes, dice and fry bacon. 2. Mix eggs, potato, bacon, cheese, and flour into batter. 3. Pan-fry on low heat until golden on both sides.

name.en: Butter Sausage and Scallion Egg Pancake

notes.zh:
配料：鸡蛋、香肠、黄油、葱花、面粉、盐
做法：1. 香肠切丁，葱花备好。2. 混合鸡蛋、面粉、葱花和盐调糊，加入香肠丁。3. 平底锅加黄油，小火煎至两面金黄。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Eggs, sausage, butter, chopped scallions, flour, salt
Method: 1. Dice sausage and prepare scallions. 2. Mix eggs, flour, scallions, and salt, add sausage. 3. Cook in butter on low heat until golden both sides.

name.zh: 菠菜口蘑胡萝卜火腿肠芝士蛋饼
name.en: Spinach, Mushroom, Carrot, Ham and Cheese Egg Pancake

notes.zh:
配料：鸡蛋、菠菜、口蘑、胡萝卜、火腿肠、芝士、盐、面粉、食用油
做法：1. 所有蔬菜切丁炒熟备用，火腿切丁。2. 鸡蛋打散，加面粉、盐搅匀，加入蔬菜和芝士。3. 平底锅加油，倒入蛋液，小火煎至两面金黄。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Eggs, spinach, mushrooms, carrots, ham, cheese, salt, flour, cooking oil
Method: 1. Dice and pre-cook all vegetables, dice ham. 2. Beat eggs, add flour and salt, then mix in vegetables and cheese. 3. Cook on low heat until golden on both sides.

notes.zh:
配料：牛排、黑胡椒、盐、黄油、大蒜、迷迭香
做法：1. 牛排室温放置20分钟，撒盐和黑胡椒。2. 热锅加油煎至两面上色，加入黄油、蒜和迷迭香反复淋油。3. 依喜好火候煎制后静置5分钟切片食用。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Steak, black pepper, salt, butter, garlic, rosemary
Method: 1. Bring steak to room temp, season with salt and pepper. 2. Sear both sides in hot pan, add butter, garlic, rosemary, baste steak. 3. Cook to desired doneness, rest 5 mins before slicing.

notes.zh:
配料：牛排、酥皮、蘑菇、火腿、盐、黑胡椒、黄油、鸡蛋
做法：1. 牛排用盐和黑胡椒腌制，煎至两面金黄。2. 蘑菇切碎炒干水分，加黄油调味。3. 酥皮铺平，放入火腿、蘑菇和牛排，包紧。4. 刷上蛋液，放入预热200度的烤箱烤30分钟。5. 烤至酥皮金黄后取出切片食用。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Steak, puff pastry, mushrooms, ham, salt, black pepper, butter, egg
Method: 1. Season steak with salt and black pepper, sear until golden on both sides. 2. Chop mushrooms, sauté until dry, season with butter. 3. Lay out puff pastry, layer with ham, mushrooms, and steak, wrap tightly. 4. Brush with egg wash, bake in a preheated 200°C oven for 30 minutes. 5. Remove when pastry is golden, slice, and serve.

notes.zh: 做法：1. 龙虾洗净，去壳，去虾线。2. 将龙虾肉切成小块，加入蛋黄酱、盐、胡椒粉、蒜末、洋葱末、辣椒粉、橄榄油拌匀。3. 将拌好的龙虾肉放入烤盘中，放入预热180度的烤箱烤10分钟。4. 烤好后取出，撒上葱花即可。
notes.en: Method: 1. Clean the lobster, remove the shell and shrimp line. 2. Cut the lobster meat into small pieces, add mayonnaise, salt, pepper, minced garlic, onion, chili powder, olive oil. 3. Place the mixed lobster meat in a baking sheet, bake in a preheated 180°C oven for 10 minutes. 4. Bake until golden brown and serve.
