notes.zh:
配料：牛肉末、土豆、胡萝卜、洋葱、黄油、奶酪、盐、黑胡椒
做法：1. 土豆煮熟捣成泥加奶油和盐调味。2. 牛肉炒熟加胡萝卜和洋葱煮至软化，加盐胡椒。3. 把肉酱铺底、土豆泥铺顶、撒芝士，烤箱200度烤20分钟。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Ground beef, potatoes, carrots, onion, butter, cheese, salt, black pepper
Method: 1. Boil and mash potatoes, mix with butter and salt. 2. Cook beef with carrots and onion, season. 3. Layer meat then mashed potatoes, top with cheese, bake at 200°C for 20 minutes.

notes.zh:
配料：培根、蘑菇、洋葱、黄油、面粉、牛奶、盐、黑胡椒
做法：1. 培根切小片，蘑菇和洋葱切碎。2. 热锅加黄油，炒培根至出油，加入洋葱和蘑菇炒软。3. 撒上面粉炒匀，倒入牛奶搅拌至浓稠。4. 加盐和黑胡椒调味，小火煮5分钟。5. 出锅后即可食用。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Bacon, mushrooms, onion, butter, flour, milk, salt, black pepper
Method: 1. Cut bacon into small pieces, chop mushrooms and onion. 2. Heat butter in a pot, fry bacon until oil renders, add onion and mushrooms, sauté until soft. 3. Sprinkle flour, stir well, pour in milk, and stir until thickened. 4. Season with salt and black pepper, simmer for 5 minutes. 5. Serve immediately.

notes.zh:
配料：生蚝、大蒜、粉丝、蒸鱼豉油、葱、红椒、食用油
做法：1. 粉丝泡软，放在蚝壳上。2. 蒜末炒香加豉油，浇在粉丝上。3. 放葱花红椒碎，蒸8分钟或上烤箱烤熟。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Oysters, garlic, vermicelli, steamed fish soy sauce, scallions, red pepper, cooking oil
Method: 1. Soak vermicelli, place on oyster shell. 2. Fry garlic with soy sauce, pour over. 3. Top with scallions and red pepper, steam 8 min or roast.

notes.zh:
配料：整鸡、盐、黑胡椒、蒜粉、迷迭香、橄榄油
做法：1. 鸡洗净，用厨房纸擦干。2. 混合盐、黑胡椒、蒜粉和迷迭香，涂抹鸡内外。3. 刷上橄榄油，放入预热180度的烤箱。4. 烤1.5小时，每30分钟翻面一次。5. 烤至表面金黄酥脆后取出食用。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Whole chicken, salt, black pepper, garlic powder, rosemary, olive oil
Method: 1. Rinse chicken and pat dry with paper towels. 2. Mix salt, black pepper, garlic powder, and rosemary, rub inside and outside the chicken. 3. Brush with olive oil, place in a preheated 180°C oven. 4. Roast for 1.5 hours, flipping every 30 minutes. 5. Remove when the surface is golden and crispy, then serve.

notes.zh:
配料：鸡翅、鸡腿、奥尔良腌料、蜂蜜、食用油
做法：1. 鸡翅鸡腿洗净，用奥尔良腌料腌制4小时。2. 烤箱预热200度，鸡肉刷蜂蜜，烤25分钟至表皮金黄。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Chicken wings, drumsticks, Orleans marinade, honey, cooking oil
Method: 1. Marinate cleaned chicken in Orleans spice for 4 hours. 2. Brush with honey, roast at 200°C for 25 minutes until golden.

notes.zh:
配料：鸡翅中、菠萝、蜂蜜、酱油、料酒、蒜末、黑胡椒、食用油
做法：1. 鸡翅洗净划刀，用酱油、料酒、蒜末、蜂蜜腌制2小时。2. 菠萝切块备用。3. 鸡翅摆盘，与菠萝一同入烤箱200°C烤25分钟，中间翻面。4. 表面刷蜂蜜，撒黑胡椒再烤5分钟出炉。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Chicken wings, pineapple, honey, soy sauce, cooking wine, minced garlic, black pepper, oil
Method: 1. Clean and score wings, marinate with soy sauce, wine, garlic, and honey for 2 hours. 2. Cut pineapple into chunks. 3. Roast wings and pineapple at 200°C for 25 minutes, flip halfway. 4. Brush with honey, sprinkle pepper, roast 5 more minutes.

notes.zh:
配料：羊肋排、孜然粉、辣椒粉、蒜末、盐、黑胡椒、食用油
做法：1. 羊排洗净抹干，用蒜末、盐、孜然粉、辣椒粉、黑胡椒和油腌制3小时。2. 放入预热烤箱200°C，烤40分钟，中途翻面并刷油。3. 表面微焦香脆后取出装盘。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Lamb ribs, cumin powder, chili powder, minced garlic, salt, black pepper, oil
Method: 1. Pat ribs dry and marinate with garlic, salt, cumin, chili powder, pepper and oil for 3 hours. 2. Roast at 200°C for 40 minutes, flip and baste midway. 3. Serve once crisp and browned.

notes.zh:
配料：韭菜、蒜蓉、辣椒粉、孜然粉、酱油、食用油
做法：1. 韭菜洗净控水，摆入烤盘。2. 混合蒜蓉、辣椒粉、孜然粉、酱油和油做料汁。3. 韭菜刷上调料，入烤箱200°C烤10分钟即可。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Leek, minced garlic, chili powder, cumin, soy sauce, oil
Method: 1. Wash and drain leeks, arrange on tray. 2. Mix garlic, chili, cumin, soy sauce and oil as sauce. 3. Brush over leeks, roast at 200°C for 10 minutes.

notes.zh:
配料：玉米棒、黄油、盐、黑胡椒、蜂蜜
做法：1. 玉米洗净，用黄油、盐、黑胡椒均匀抹匀。2. 烤箱预热200°C，烤20分钟，中途翻面。3. 出炉前刷一层蜂蜜再烤3分钟即可。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Corn cob, butter, salt, black pepper, honey
Method: 1. Clean corn and coat with butter, salt, pepper. 2. Roast at 200°C for 20 minutes, flipping once. 3. Brush with honey and roast 3 more minutes.

notes.zh:
配料：包菜（圆白菜）、蒜末、辣椒粉、盐、橄榄油
做法：1. 包菜切块或切厚片，拌上蒜末、盐、辣椒粉和橄榄油。2. 烤盘铺纸，摆上包菜。3. 烤箱200°C烤20分钟至边缘微焦即可。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Cabbage, minced garlic, chili powder, salt, olive oil
Method: 1. Cut cabbage into chunks or thick slices, toss with garlic, salt, chili and oil. 2. Lay on baking paper. 3. Roast at 200°C for 20 minutes until edges are crisp.

notes.zh:
配料：茄子、大蒜、葱、辣椒粉、孜然、酱油、食用油
做法：1. 茄子切半，表面划刀，用油刷匀。2. 烤箱预热200°C，茄子烤15分钟。3. 炒香蒜末、辣椒粉、孜然和酱油，浇在茄子上继续烤10分钟，撒葱花即可。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Eggplant, garlic, scallions, chili powder, cumin, soy sauce, cooking oil
Method: 1. Halve eggplant and score, brush with oil. 2. Roast at 200°C for 15 min. 3. Sauté garlic, chili, cumin, soy sauce, pour on eggplant and roast 10 more min. Top with scallions.

notes.zh:
配料：牛排、盐、黑胡椒、黄油、蒜、迷迭香
做法：1. 牛排室温放置20分钟，抹盐和黑胡椒。2. 热锅煎至两面上色，加入黄油、蒜和迷迭香反复淋油至熟。3. 静置5分钟切片食用。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Steak, salt, black pepper, butter, garlic, rosemary
Method: 1. Bring steak to room temp, season with salt & pepper. 2. Sear both sides, baste with butter, garlic, rosemary until done. 3. Rest 5 mins before slicing.

notes.zh: 配料：白芝麻一勺，蒜末两勺，蜂蜜一勺，韩式辣酱两勺，香油一勺，生抽一勺
notes.en: Ingredients: White sesame, minced garlic, honey, Korean chili paste, sesame oil, soy sauce

notes.zh: 配料：蒜末一勺，洋葱丝，白糖一勺，生抽一勺，孜然粉2勺
notes.en: Ingredients: Minced garlic, onion, sugar, soy sauce, cumin powder

notes.zh: 配料：鸡蛋一个，白胡椒粉半勺，孜然粉两勺，花椒粉一勺，盐适量，葱末姜丝
notes.en: Ingredients: Egg, white pepper, cumin, pepper, salt, scallions, ginger

notes.zh: 配料：洋葱丝，盐半勺，黑胡椒粉三勺，生抽一勺，耗油一勺，蜂蜜半勺。
notes.en: Ingredients: Onion, salt, black pepper, soy sauce, oyster sauce, honey

notes.zh: 配料：奥尔良腌料4勺，蜂蜜一勺
notes.en: Ingredients: Oraly seasoning, honey

notes.zh: 配料：洋葱丝，蒜末一勺，花椒面半勺，生抽一勺，蚝油一勺，孜然粉两勺
notes.en: Ingredients: Onion, minced garlic, pepper, soy sauce, oyster sauce, cumin

notes.zh: 配料：葱姜，盐一勺，生抽一勺，蚝油一勺，蜂蜜两勺
notes.en: Ingredients: Scallions, ginger, salt, soy sauce, oyster sauce, honey

notes.zh: 配料：辣椒面三勺，盐一勺，生抽一勺，耗油一勺，孜然粉两勺，食用油适量
notes.en: Ingredients: Chili paste, salt, soy sauce, oyster sauce, cumin

notes.zh: 配料：蒜末两勺，黑胡椒粉一勺，生抽两勺，蚝油一勺，蜂蜜两勺
notes.en: Ingredients: Minced garlic, black pepper, soy sauce, oyster sauce, honey

notes.zh: 配料：辣椒面四勺，盐一勺，鸡精一勺，花椒面一勺，淀粉，食用油
notes.en: Ingredients: Chili paste, salt, chicken powder, pepper, starch, cooking oil

notes.zh:
配料：鸡腿肉、香菇、洋葱、黑松露酱、生抽、蚝油、米饭
做法：1. 鸡肉腌制后与洋葱香菇炒香。2. 加调料和黑松露拌炒，加入米饭焖熟即可。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Chicken thigh, mushrooms, onion, truffle paste, soy sauce, oyster sauce, rice
Method: 1. Marinate chicken, stir-fry with onion and mushrooms. 2. Add sauces and truffle, mix with rice, steam together.

notes.zh:
配料：五花肉、姜、蒜、酱油、料酒、糖、鸡蛋、米饭
做法：1. 五花肉炒至出油，加入调料焖煮入味。2. 放入鸡蛋煮至上色，配米饭食用。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Pork belly, ginger, garlic, soy sauce, cooking wine, sugar, eggs, rice
Method: 1. Fry pork till fat renders, add seasonings, simmer. 2. Add eggs to absorb flavor, serve with rice.

notes.zh:
配料：五花肉、南瓜或土豆、洋葱、米、酱油、蚝油
做法：1. 五花肉炒香后加入南瓜或土豆炒匀。2. 加米和调料，加水焖煮至米饭熟透。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Pork belly, pumpkin or potato, onion, rice, soy sauce, oyster sauce
Method: 1. Stir-fry pork, add pumpkin or potato. 2. Mix with rice and sauces, cook with water till done.

notes.zh:
配料：鸡腿肉、照烧酱、米饭、西兰花、胡萝卜
做法：1. 鸡腿煎熟淋照烧酱收汁。2. 配上米饭和配菜摆盘即可。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Chicken thigh, teriyaki sauce, rice, broccoli, carrot
Method: 1. Pan-fry chicken, glaze with teriyaki sauce. 2. Plate with rice and vegetables.

notes.zh:
配料：羊肉、胡萝卜、洋葱、米、孜然、香料、盐
做法：1. 羊肉焯水后炒香，加入胡萝卜洋葱炒匀。2. 与米饭同焖，加香料煮至入味。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Lamb, carrot, onion, rice, cumin, spices, salt
Method: 1. Blanch and stir-fry lamb, add carrot and onion. 2. Mix with rice and spices, cook until done.

notes.zh:
配料：牛肉、鸡蛋、大米、葱、姜、酱油、淀粉、盐、食用油
做法：1. 牛肉切薄片，用酱油和淀粉腌制15分钟。2. 鸡蛋打散加少许盐。3. 热锅加油，炒牛肉至变色，盛出。4. 锅中加油，倒入蛋液炒至半熟，加入牛肉翻炒。5. 将炒好的牛肉蛋盖在煮熟的米饭上，撒上葱花食用。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Beef, eggs, rice, green onions, ginger, soy sauce, cornstarch, salt, cooking oil
Method: 1. Slice beef thinly, marinate with soy sauce and cornstarch for 15 minutes. 2. Beat eggs with a pinch of salt. 3. Heat oil in a pan, stir-fry beef until it changes color, then remove. 4. Add oil to the pan, pour in eggs and scramble until half-cooked, add beef back and stir-fry. 5. Serve over cooked rice, sprinkle with green onions.

notes.zh:
配料：鸡肉或牛肉、土豆、胡萝卜、洋葱、咖喱块、米饭
做法：1. 炒肉和蔬菜，加水煮沸。2. 加入咖喱块煮至浓稠，配米饭食用。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Chicken or beef, potato, carrot, onion, curry cubes, rice
Method: 1. Stir-fry meat and vegetables, add water and boil. 2. Add curry cubes, simmer till thickened, serve with rice.

notes.zh:
配料：牛肉馅、洋葱、鸡蛋、面包糠、黑椒酱、米饭
做法：1. 混合牛肉馅、洋葱、蛋和面包糠做成肉饼。2. 煎至两面金黄，淋黑椒酱即可配饭。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Ground beef, onion, egg, breadcrumbs, black pepper sauce, rice
Method: 1. Mix all to form patty, pan-fry until golden. 2. Top with sauce, serve with rice.

notes.zh:
配料：剩饭、鸡蛋、火腿、胡萝卜、葱、酱油、盐、食用油
做法：1. 鸡蛋打散，火腿和胡萝卜切丁，葱切段。2. 热锅加油，炒鸡蛋至熟，盛出。3. 加少许油，放入火腿和胡萝卜炒香。4. 加入剩饭翻炒均匀，加酱油和盐调味。5. 放入鸡蛋和葱段，炒匀后出锅。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Leftover rice, eggs, ham, carrots, green onions, soy sauce, salt, cooking oil
Method: 1. Beat eggs, dice ham and carrots, cut green onions into segments. 2. Heat oil in a pan, scramble eggs until cooked, then remove. 3. Add a little oil, sauté ham and carrots until fragrant. 4. Add leftover rice, stir-fry evenly, season with soy sauce and salt. 5. Add eggs and green onions, stir well, and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：猪梅花肉、蜂蜜、酱油、料酒、糖、五香粉、蒜、食用油
做法：1. 猪肉切长条，用酱油、料酒、糖、五香粉和蒜末腌制一夜。2. 烤箱/空气炸锅预热180度，猪肉放在烤架上，刷上蜂蜜。3. 烤30分钟，每10分钟翻面并刷一次蜜汁。4. 烤至表面焦糖色即可。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Pork shoulder, honey, soy sauce, cooking wine, sugar, five-spice powder, garlic, cooking oil
Method: 1. Cut pork into long strips, marinate with soy sauce, cooking wine, sugar, five-spice powder, and minced garlic overnight. 2. Preheat oven/air fryer to 180°C, place pork on a rack, and brush with honey. 3. Bake for 30 minutes, flipping and brushing with honey every 10 minutes. 4. Bake until caramelized and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：大米，肉（鸡腿肉/腊肉/腊肠/牛肉），鸡蛋，生抽，老抽，蚝油，香油，料酒，食用油，盐，糖，黑胡椒，葱花，清水
做法：1. 大米提前浸泡半小时。
2. 腌制肉类（牛肉/鸡腿肉），生抽一勺，老抽一勺，香油一勺，料酒一勺，蚝油一勺，淀粉一勺，黑胡椒粉少量。
3. 珐琅锅底部刷油，铺上大米，加入水，水米比例1：1，大火煮沸后转小火盖盖焖煮10分钟 
4. 铺平加入腌制好的肉类/腊肠/腊肉继续小火盖盖焖煮10分钟. 
5.加入一圈油（为了形成锅巴），打入鸡蛋，继续小火盖盖焖煮5分钟。
6. 出锅前撒上葱花。
7. 酱汁：生抽三勺，老抽一勺，蚝油一勺，盐一小勺，糖三勺，白胡椒粉半勺，香油半勺，水四勺
notes.en:
Ingredients: Rice, meat (chicken thigh / cured pork / Chinese sausage / beef), egg, light soy sauce, dark soy sauce, oyster sauce, sesame oil, cooking wine, cooking oil, salt, sugar, black pepper, chopped scallions, water
Instructions: 1. Soak the rice in water for 30 minutes.
2. Marinate the meat (beef or chicken thigh) with 1 tbsp each of light soy sauce, dark soy sauce, sesame oil, cooking wine, oyster sauce, 1 tbsp of starch, and a small amount of black pepper.
3. Brush oil on the bottom of an enamel pot, spread the rice, add water (water-to-rice ratio 1:1), bring to a boil over high heat, then cover and simmer on low heat for 10 minutes.
4. Add the marinated meat / Chinese sausage / cured pork evenly, cover, and continue to simmer on low heat for another 10 minutes.
5. Drizzle a ring of oil (to create crispy rice crust), crack in an egg, cover and simmer on low heat for 5 more minutes.
6. Sprinkle chopped scallions before serving.
7. Sauce: Mix 3 tbsp light soy sauce, 1 tbsp dark soy sauce, 1 tbsp oyster sauce, 1 tsp salt, 3 tsp sugar, ½ tsp white pepper, ½ tsp sesame oil, and 4 tbsp water.

notes.zh:
配料：面条、猪肉、青椒、葱、姜、酱油、淀粉、盐、食用油
做法：1. 猪肉切丝，用酱油和淀粉腌制15分钟，青椒切丝。2. 热锅加油，炒肉丝至变色，盛出。3. 加少许油，爆香葱姜，放入青椒炒软。4. 回锅肉丝，加盐调味，炒匀后盖在煮熟的面条上食用。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Noodles, pork, green peppers, green onions, ginger, soy sauce, cornstarch, salt, cooking oil
Method: 1. Shred pork, marinate with soy sauce and cornstarch for 15 minutes, shred green peppers. 2. Heat oil in a pan, stir-fry pork until it changes color, then remove. 3. Add a little oil, sauté green onions and ginger, add green peppers and stir-fry until soft. 4. Return pork to the pan, season with salt, stir well, and serve over cooked noodles.

notes.zh:
配料：面条、牛肉、葱、姜、八角、酱油、盐、食用油
做法：1. 牛肉切块焯水去血沫。2. 热锅加油，炒葱姜和八角，放入牛肉煸炒。3. 加水煮开，小火炖1小时，加酱油和盐调味。4. 面条煮熟捞出，放入牛肉汤中。5. 撒上葱花后食用。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Noodles, beef, green onions, ginger, star anise, soy sauce, salt, cooking oil
Method: 1. Cut beef into chunks and blanch to remove blood foam. 2. Heat oil in a pan, sauté green onions, ginger, and star anise, add beef and stir-fry. 3. Add water, bring to a boil, simmer for 1 hour, season with soy sauce and salt. 4. Cook noodles, drain, and place in beef broth. 5. Sprinkle with green onions and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：排骨、土豆、宽面、姜、酱油、料酒、盐
做法：1. 排骨炒香，加土豆炒匀。2. 加调料和水炖煮，再加入面条焖至熟。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Pork ribs, potato, wide noodles, ginger, soy sauce, cooking wine, salt
Method: 1. Fry ribs and potatoes. 2. Add seasonings and water, stew, add noodles to simmer till cooked.

notes.zh:
配料：面条、葱、酱油、糖、食用油
做法：1. 面条煮熟过凉水。2. 炸葱制成葱油。3. 拌入酱油、糖后与面条混合。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Noodles, scallions, soy sauce, sugar, oil
Method: 1. Boil noodles, rinse with cold water. 2. Fry scallions to make oil. 3. Mix with soy and sugar, toss with noodles.

notes.zh:
配料：面条、土豆、四季豆、猪肉、葱、姜、酱油、盐、食用油
做法：1. 土豆切块，四季豆掰段，猪肉切片。2. 热锅加油，炒猪肉至变色，加葱姜炒香。3. 放入土豆和四季豆翻炒，加酱油和盐调味。4. 加入面条和适量水，大火煮开后小火焖10分钟。5. 水分收干后拌匀食用。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Noodles, potatoes, green beans, pork, green onions, ginger, soy sauce, salt, cooking oil
Method: 1. Cut potatoes into chunks, break green beans into segments, slice pork. 2. Heat oil in a pan, stir-fry pork until it changes color, add green onions and ginger and sauté. 3. Add potatoes and green beans, stir-fry, season with soy sauce and salt. 4. Add noodles and enough water, bring to a boil, then simmer for 10 minutes. 5. Mix well once water is absorbed and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：面条、番茄、鸡蛋、葱、姜、酱油、糖、盐、食用油
做法：1. 番茄切块，鸡蛋打散，葱姜切末。2. 热锅加油，炒鸡蛋至熟，盛出。3. 加少许油，炒葱姜和番茄至出汁，加糖和盐调味。4. 面条煮熟捞出，放入番茄蛋汁中拌匀。5. 撒上葱花后食用。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Noodles, tomatoes, eggs, green onions, ginger, soy sauce, sugar, salt, cooking oil
Method: 1. Dice tomatoes, beat eggs, mince green onions and ginger. 2. Heat oil in a pan, scramble eggs until cooked, then remove. 3. Add a little oil, sauté green onions, ginger, and tomatoes until juicy, season with sugar and salt. 4. Cook noodles, drain, and mix with tomato-egg sauce. 5. Sprinkle with green onions and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：面条、葱、蒜、干辣椒粉、酱油、醋、盐、食用油
做法：1. 面条煮熟捞出，放入碗中。2. 葱切段，蒜切末，撒上干辣椒粉。3. 热锅加油，油烧至冒烟后泼在调料上。4. 加酱油和醋拌匀。5. 拌匀后即可食用。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Noodles, green onions, garlic, chili powder, soy sauce, vinegar, salt, cooking oil
Method: 1. Cook noodles, drain, and place in a bowl. 2. Cut green onions into segments, mince garlic, sprinkle with chili powder. 3. Heat oil in a pan until smoking, pour over the seasonings. 4. Add soy sauce and vinegar, mix well. 5. Stir and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：面条、猪肉末、甜面酱、黄豆酱、葱、姜、食用油
做法：1. 热锅加油，炒葱姜和猪肉末至变色。2. 加入甜面酱和黄豆酱炒香，加少许水煮开。3. 小火熬至酱汁浓稠。4. 面条煮熟捞出，淋上炸酱。5. 拌匀后食用。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Noodles, ground pork, sweet bean paste, soybean paste, green onions, ginger, cooking oil
Method: 1. Heat oil in a pan, sauté green onions, ginger, and ground pork until it changes color. 2. Add sweet bean paste and soybean paste, stir-fry until fragrant, add a little water and bring to a boil. 3. Simmer until the sauce thickens. 4. Cook noodles, drain, and top with the sauce. 5. Mix well and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：冷面、鸡蛋、火腿肠、葱、酱油、糖、醋、食用油
做法：1. 冷面提前泡软，火腿肠切片，葱切段。2. 热平底锅加油，放入冷面煎至一面金黄。3. 翻面后打入鸡蛋，煎熟。4. 加火腿肠、酱油、糖和醋调味，撒上葱段。5. 煎至两面焦脆后食用。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Cold noodles, egg, sausage, green onions, soy sauce, sugar, vinegar, cooking oil
Method: 1. Soak cold noodles until soft, slice sausage, cut green onions into segments. 2. Heat oil in a flat pan, fry noodles until one side is golden. 3. Flip, crack an egg on top, and fry until cooked. 4. Add sausage, season with soy sauce, sugar, and vinegar, sprinkle with green onions. 5. Fry until both sides are crispy and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：面粉、猪里脊肉、面粉、淀粉、鸡蛋、葱、酱油、盐、食用油
做法：1. 面粉加水揉成面团，发酵后擀成饼，烤至金黄。2. 猪里脊切条，用酱油腌制20分钟。3. 面粉、淀粉和鸡蛋调成糊，裹在肉条上。4. 热锅加油，炸肉条至金黄酥脆。5. 炸好的肉夹入饼中，撒上葱花食用。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Flour, pork tenderloin, flour, cornstarch, egg, green onions, soy sauce, salt, cooking oil
Method: 1. Mix flour with water to form a dough, ferment, roll into flatbreads, and bake until golden. 2. Cut pork tenderloin into strips, marinate with soy sauce for 20 minutes. 3. Mix flour, cornstarch, and egg into a batter, coat pork strips. 4. Heat oil in a pan, fry pork strips until golden and crispy. 5. Place fried pork in the flatbreads, sprinkle with green onions, and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：面粉、牛肉末、葱、姜、酱油、盐、食用油
做法：1. 面粉加水揉成面团，醒30分钟。2. 牛肉末加葱姜末、酱油和盐拌匀。3. 面团分成小份，擀成圆皮包入牛肉馅。4. 热平底锅加油，煎馅饼至两面金黄。5. 出锅后食用。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Flour, ground beef, green onions, ginger, soy sauce, salt, cooking oil
Method: 1. Mix flour with water to form a dough, let rest for 30 minutes. 2. Mix ground beef with minced green onions, ginger, soy sauce, and salt. 3. Divide dough into small portions, roll into rounds, and fill with beef mixture. 4. Heat oil in a flat pan, fry pies until golden on both sides. 5. Serve immediately.

notes.zh:
配料：面粉、牛肉末、葱、姜、酱油、盐、食用油
做法：1. 面粉加水揉成面团，醒30分钟。2. 牛肉末加葱姜末、酱油和盐拌匀。3. 面团分成小份，擀成圆皮包入牛肉馅。4. 热平底锅加油，放入锅贴煎至底部金黄，加水盖盖焖5分钟。5. 水分收干后出锅食用。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Flour, ground beef, green onions, ginger, soy sauce, salt, cooking oil
Method: 1. Mix flour with water to form a dough, let rest for 30 minutes. 2. Mix ground beef with minced green onions, ginger, soy sauce, and salt. 3. Divide dough into small portions, roll into rounds, and fill with beef mixture. 4. Heat oil in a flat pan, fry dumplings until bottoms are golden, add water, cover, and steam for 5 minutes. 5. Serve once water evaporates.

notes.zh:
配料：饼皮、鸡蛋、生菜、火腿、甜面酱
做法：1. 饼加热后打入鸡蛋摊匀煎熟。2. 涂酱后加配料卷起即可。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Pancake, egg, lettuce, ham, sweet sauce
Method: 1. Cook pancake with egg. 2. Add sauce and fillings, roll up and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：鸡蛋、面粉、水、盐、葱花、食用油
做法：1. 鸡蛋打散加面粉、水、盐和葱花搅匀成面糊。2. 平底锅加油，倒入面糊摊平。3. 小火煎至两面金黄，切块食用。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Eggs, flour, water, salt, chopped green onion, cooking oil
Method: 1. Beat eggs and mix with flour, water, salt, and green onion. 2. Heat oil in a pan, pour in batter and spread evenly. 3. Cook on low heat until golden on both sides, then slice and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：面粉、水、葱、盐、食用油
做法：1. 面粉加水和少许盐揉成面团，醒30分钟。2. 擀成薄片，刷油撒上葱花，卷起再擀平。3. 热平底锅加油，放入面饼煎至两面金黄。4. 煎好后用手抓松。5. 出锅后即可食用。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Flour, water, green onions, salt, cooking oil
Method: 1. Mix flour with water and a pinch of salt to form a dough, let rest for 30 minutes. 2. Roll out into a thin sheet, brush with oil, sprinkle with chopped green onions, roll up, and flatten again. 3. Heat oil in a flat pan, fry the pancake until golden on both sides. 4. After frying, scrunch with hands to loosen. 5. Serve immediately.

notes.zh:
配料：面粉、酱料（甜面酱）、葱、芝麻、盐、食用油
做法：1. 和面醒发后擀成圆饼状。2. 表面刷酱，撒芝麻和葱花。3. 平底锅加油，小火煎至两面金黄熟透。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Flour, sauce (sweet bean paste), green onions, sesame seeds, salt, cooking oil
Method: 1. Make dough and rest, roll into a round. 2. Spread sauce, sprinkle sesame and green onions. 3. Cook in a pan on low heat until golden and cooked through.

notes.zh:
配料：面粉、猪肉末、葱、姜、酱油、盐、食用油
做法：1. 面粉加水揉成面团，醒30分钟。2. 猪肉末加葱姜末、酱油和盐拌匀。3. 面团擀成大圆皮，抹油撒肉馅，卷起压扁。4. 热平底锅加油，煎至两面金黄酥脆。5. 出锅后食用。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Flour, ground pork, green onions, ginger, soy sauce, salt, cooking oil
Method: 1. Mix flour with water to form a dough, let rest for 30 minutes. 2. Mix ground pork with minced green onions, ginger, soy sauce, and salt. 3. Roll dough into a large round, spread with oil and meat filling, roll up and flatten. 4. Heat oil in a flat pan, fry until golden and crispy on both sides. 5. Serve immediately.

notes.zh:
配料：面粉、猪肉、葱、姜、八角、酱油、料酒、糖、食用油
做法：1. 面粉加水揉成面团，发酵后擀成饼，烤至金黄。2. 猪肉切块焯水，热锅加油炒至表面焦黄。3. 加葱姜、八角、酱油、料酒和糖，加水炖1小时。4. 炖好的肉剁碎，夹入烤好的饼中。5. 出锅后食用。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Flour, pork, green onions, ginger, star anise, soy sauce, cooking wine, sugar, cooking oil
Method: 1. Mix flour with water to form a dough, ferment, roll into flatbreads, and bake until golden. 2. Cut pork into chunks, blanch, then fry in a heated pan with oil until browned. 3. Add green onions, ginger, star anise, soy sauce, cooking wine, and sugar, cover with water and braise for 1 hour. 4. Chop braised pork and stuff into baked flatbreads. 5. Serve immediately.

notes.zh:
配料：切碎烙饼、鸡蛋、青菜、豆芽、酱油、盐、食用油
做法：1. 烙饼切丝备用。2. 热锅加油炒鸡蛋，盛出。3. 炒菜和豆芽至熟，放入饼丝和鸡蛋，加酱油盐翻炒均匀。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Sliced flatbread, eggs, vegetables, bean sprouts, soy sauce, salt, cooking oil
Method: 1. Cut flatbread into strips. 2. Scramble eggs and remove. 3. Stir-fry vegetables and bean sprouts, then add bread strips and eggs, season and stir evenly.

notes.zh:
配料：鸡胸肉、玉米粒、胡萝卜、鸡蛋、盐、淀粉、水
做法：1. 鸡肉切丁，胡萝卜切小粒。2. 锅中加水，放鸡丁、胡萝卜、玉米煮开。3. 加盐调味，淀粉水勾芡，打入蛋液搅匀即可。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Chicken breast, corn kernels, carrot, egg, salt, starch, water
Method: 1. Dice chicken and carrot. 2. Boil with corn until cooked. 3. Season, thicken with starch water, add egg and stir.

notes.zh:
配料：羊肉、葱、姜、白萝卜、八角、盐、食用油
做法：1. 羊肉切块焯水去血沫。2. 热锅加油，炒葱姜和八角，放入羊肉煸炒。3. 加水煮开，小火炖1.5小时。4. 加入白萝卜块，再煮20分钟。5. 加盐调味后出锅。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Lamb, green onions, ginger, white radish, star anise, salt, cooking oil
Method: 1. Cut lamb into chunks and blanch to remove blood foam. 2. Heat oil in a pot, sauté green onions, ginger, and star anise, add lamb and stir-fry. 3. Add water, bring to a boil, simmer for 1.5 hours. 4. Add white radish chunks, cook for another 20 minutes. 5. Season with salt and serve.

name.en: Vermicelli, Cabbage and Beef Ball Soup

notes.zh:
配料：粉丝、白菜、牛肉丸、葱、姜、酱油、盐、食用油
做法：1. 粉丝泡软，白菜切段，牛肉丸备好。2. 热锅加油，爆香葱姜。3. 加水煮开，放入牛肉丸煮5分钟。4. 加入白菜和粉丝，再煮3分钟。5. 加酱油和盐调味后出锅。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Vermicelli, cabbage, beef balls, green onions, ginger, soy sauce, salt, cooking oil
Method: 1. Soak vermicelli until soft, cut cabbage into segments, prepare beef balls. 2. Heat oil in a pot, sauté green onions and ginger. 3. Add water and bring to a boil, add beef balls and cook for 5 minutes. 4. Add cabbage and vermicelli, cook for another 3 minutes. 5. Season with soy sauce and salt, then serve.

notes.zh:
暖暖的，好喝😋。
 做法：紫菜，榨菜，盐，白胡椒，生抽，香油，葱花，淀粉水勾芡
notes.en:
Warm and delicious. 
 Method: Dried seaweed, pickled vegetables, salt, white pepper, soy sauce, sesame oil, green onions, cornstarch slurry

notes.zh:
配料：番茄、鸡蛋、葱、盐、香油、水
做法：1. 番茄切块炒软，加水煮开。2. 打入蛋液搅拌成蛋花。3. 加盐调味，撒葱花淋香油即可。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Tomato, egg, scallions, salt, sesame oil, water
Method: 1. Fry tomato until soft, add water and boil. 2. Add beaten eggs and stir. 3. Season, top with scallions and sesame oil.

notes.zh:
配料：面粉、番茄、鸡蛋、葱、盐、食用油
做法：1. 面粉加水调成面疙瘩，番茄切块，鸡蛋打散。2. 热锅加油，炒番茄至出汁，加水煮开。3. 下入面疙瘩，煮至浮起。4. 倒入蛋液，搅拌成蛋花，加盐调味。5. 撒上葱花后出锅。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Flour, tomatoes, eggs, green onions, salt, cooking oil
Method: 1. Mix flour with water to form dough lumps, dice tomatoes, beat eggs. 2. Heat oil in a pot, sauté tomatoes until juicy, add water and bring to a boil. 3. Add dough lumps, cook until they float. 4. Pour in egg mixture, stir into egg flowers, season with salt. 5. Sprinkle with green onions and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：大米、水、盐，可选配料（皮蛋、鸡丝、咸菜）
做法：1. 大米淘洗后加水煮开，小火慢熬30-40分钟。2. 根据口味加入咸菜、皮蛋、鸡丝等配料。3. 加盐调味即可。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Rice, water, salt, optional toppings (century egg, shredded chicken, pickles)
Method: 1. Rinse rice and cook with water for 30–40 min. 2. Add toppings like chicken or egg. 3. Season with salt.

notes.zh:
配料：山药、玉米、排骨、姜片、盐、水
做法：1. 排骨焯水去血沫备用，山药去皮切段，玉米切段。2. 锅中加水放入排骨、姜片煮开。3. 加入玉米小火炖40分钟，再加入山药炖20分钟，加盐调味即可。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Chinese yam, corn, pork ribs, ginger slices, salt, water
Method: 1. Blanch ribs, peel and cut yam, cut corn into pieces. 2. Add ribs and ginger to boiling water. 3. Simmer 40 mins, add yam and cook 20 more mins, season with salt.

notes.zh:
配料：木耳、豆腐、猪肉丝、鸡蛋、醋、胡椒粉、酱油、淀粉、食用油
做法：1. 木耳泡发切丝，豆腐切条，猪肉切丝腌制。2. 热锅加油，炒肉丝至变色，加入木耳和豆腐。3. 加水煮开，调入醋、胡椒粉和酱油。4. 淀粉加水勾芡，倒入蛋液成蛋花。5. 煮1分钟后出锅。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Wood ear mushrooms, tofu, pork shreds, egg, vinegar, white pepper, soy sauce, cornstarch, cooking oil
Method: 1. Soak and shred wood ear mushrooms, cut tofu into strips, marinate pork shreds. 2. Heat oil in a pot, stir-fry pork until it changes color, add wood ear and tofu. 3. Add water and bring to a boil, season with vinegar, white pepper, and soy sauce. 4. Thicken with cornstarch slurry, pour in egg to form egg flowers. 5. Cook for 1 minute and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：淡奶油、牛奶、吉利丁、糖、香草精、水果酱
做法：1. 吉利丁用冷水泡软。2. 淡奶油、牛奶和糖小火加热至糖融化，加入吉利丁搅匀。3. 加香草精倒入杯中冷藏4小时，淋上果酱即可。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Cream, milk, gelatin, sugar, vanilla extract, fruit sauce
Method: 1. Soak gelatin in cold water. 2. Heat cream, milk, sugar until dissolved, add gelatin. 3. Add vanilla, pour into cups, chill 4 hrs, top with fruit sauce.

notes.zh:
配料：手指饼干、马斯卡彭奶酪、蛋黄、糖、咖啡液、可可粉、淡奶油
做法：1. 蛋黄加糖隔水打发，加入马斯卡彭拌匀，再加入打发奶油。2. 手指饼干浸咖啡液铺底，抹奶酪糊，重复两层。3. 冷藏4小时，撒可可粉食用。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Ladyfingers, mascarpone, egg yolks, sugar, coffee, cocoa powder, cream
Method: 1. Whip yolks with sugar over heat, mix in mascarpone and whipped cream. 2. Layer coffee-soaked ladyfingers and cream twice. 3. Chill 4 hrs, dust with cocoa.

notes.zh:
配料：蛋挞皮、牛奶、淡奶油、鸡蛋、糖、香草精
做法：1. 鸡蛋打散，加牛奶、奶油、糖和香草精拌匀。2. 将液体倒入挞皮。3. 烤箱200°C烤25分钟至表面微焦即成。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Tart shell, milk, cream, eggs, sugar, vanilla extract
Method: 1. Mix beaten eggs with milk, cream, sugar, and vanilla. 2. Pour into shells. 3. Bake at 200°C for 25 mins until golden.

notes.zh:
配料：芒果、牛奶、淡奶油、吉利丁、糖
做法：1. 芒果打成果泥，吉利丁泡软。2. 牛奶、奶油加糖加热后加入吉利丁搅匀。3. 混合芒果泥倒入模具冷藏4小时。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Mango, milk, cream, gelatin, sugar
Method: 1. Puree mango, soak gelatin. 2. Heat milk and cream with sugar, stir in gelatin. 3. Mix with mango, pour into molds, chill 4 hrs.

notes.zh:
配料：低筋面粉、鸡蛋、牛奶、油、糖、柠檬汁
做法：1. 蛋黄、牛奶、油和面粉拌匀，蛋白加糖和柠檬汁打发。2. 混合蛋白和蛋黄糊。3. 倒入模具，烤箱170°C烤40分钟，倒扣冷却。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Cake flour, eggs, milk, oil, sugar, lemon juice
Method: 1. Mix yolks, milk, oil, flour. Whip whites with sugar and lemon. 2. Combine both. 3. Bake at 170°C for 40 mins, cool upside down.

notes.zh:
配料：派皮、南瓜、鸡蛋、淡奶油、糖、肉桂粉、姜粉
做法：1. 南瓜蒸熟压成泥。2. 鸡蛋、淡奶油、糖、肉桂粉和姜粉拌匀，加入南瓜泥搅拌。3. 将混合物倒入派皮中。4. 放入预热180度的烤箱，烤40-50分钟。5. 烤至馅料凝固，冷却后食用。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Pie crust, pumpkin, eggs, heavy cream, sugar, cinnamon powder, ginger powder
Method: 1. Steam pumpkin and mash into a puree. 2. Mix eggs, heavy cream, sugar, cinnamon, and ginger powder, then stir in pumpkin puree. 3. Pour mixture into pie crust. 4. Bake in a preheated 180°C oven for 40-50 minutes. 5. Bake until filling sets, cool, and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：红茶、柠檬、冰糖、清水
做法：1. 红茶煮好后加入冰糖溶解。2. 放入柠檬片冷藏后饮用。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Black tea, lemon, rock sugar, water
Method: 1. Brew tea and dissolve sugar. 2. Add lemon slices, chill and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：红茶、牛奶、糖、水
做法：1. 红茶用热水冲泡5分钟。2. 加入牛奶和糖，小火加热搅拌至糖溶解。3. 煮至微沸后关火。4. 过滤茶渣，倒入杯中。5. 可加冰块或热饮用。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Black tea, milk, sugar, water
Method: 1. Brew black tea with hot water for 5 minutes. 2. Add milk and sugar, heat over low flame while stirring until sugar dissolves. 3. Turn off heat just before boiling. 4. Strain tea leaves, pour into a cup. 5. Serve hot or with ice.

notes.zh:
配料：芒果、冰块、牛奶或酸奶、蜂蜜
做法：1. 所有食材放入搅拌机搅匀即可。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Mango, ice, milk or yogurt, honey
Method: 1. Blend all ingredients until smooth and serve.

notes.zh:
配料：抹茶粉、牛奶、糖或蜂蜜、水
做法：1. 抹茶粉用少量热水调成糊状。2. 牛奶加热至微热，加入糖或蜂蜜搅拌。3. 将抹茶糊倒入牛奶中，搅拌均匀。4. 可加奶泡装饰。5. 热饮或加冰饮用。
notes.en:
Ingredients: Matcha powder, milk, sugar or honey, water
Method: 1. Mix matcha powder with a little hot water into a paste. 2. Heat milk until warm, stir in sugar or honey. 3. Pour matcha paste into milk, stir well. 4. Optionally top with foam. 5. Serve hot or over ice.
